Released on March 27, 2011, this system features a 3.53-inch LCD display with a resolution of 320 x 240, capable of stereoscopic 3D. A unique 3D depth slider allows for adjustable 3D intensity, with the option to play all games in 2D.

Input is supported via camera, stylus, touchscreen, and wireless controller. The 3DS is powered by a rechargeable Lithium-Ion battery offering up to 8 hours of playtime. It measures 5.3 inches wide, 2.91 inches high, and 0.83 inches deep, weighing 0.51 lbs.

Enhanced gameplay is provided by a motion sensor and gyro sensor that react to system movement and tilt. The system supports Nintendo 3DS, DS, and DSi Game Cards, along with SD Memory Cards. It features wireless internet connectivity and 128 MB of FCRAM, powered by a dual-core ARM processor.

After the Bakugan Battle Brawls, enter the world of Bakugan to take control of your battle-hardened monsters. Nurture them back to full health and improve their battle skills with a comprehensive training regimen. Train your Bakugan to excel in all aspects of fighting through an in-depth training mode, similar to popular games like Pokémon Ranger and Ubisoft's Petz. Once trained, send your monsters back into battle on a mission to free their imprisoned brethren from the enemy's hold.

Elevate your PC gaming with this upgraded gaming mouse, featuring a premium metal bottom cover for enhanced texture and a satisfying weight. The solid build ensures stable movement and precise control, improving your attack accuracy and hit rate in-game.

Experience immersive visuals with a double RGB streamer strip design, boasting high-brightness lamp beads for a gorgeous, rainbow-like lighting effect. Choose from 7 distinct lighting modes to match your mood or gaming session, enhancing your nighttime use and overall experience.

The dedicated firepower key allows for instant, precise actions, giving you a competitive edge with minimal effort. Built for durability, this mouse offers a lifespan of up to 50 million keystrokes, guaranteeing longevity through countless gaming marathons.

Enjoy seamless setup with plug-and-play compatibility across Windows operating systems (7/8/10/XP, Vista 7/8). Please note, the programmable function is not supported on Mac OS. The package includes the RGB Gaming Mouse, a user manual, and a CD.

Protect your Nintendo 3DS with this 4-piece vinyl skin kit, featuring high-resolution graphics and an ultra-finish. Each skin is protected by Mighty Shield, a durable laminate that prevents scratching, fading, and peeling without leaving sticky residue. The advanced air-release vinyl ensures a perfect installation every time, and removal is a snap, leaving no gooey residue for over four years. This kit covers the front, back, inside, and outside of your Nintendo 3DS, offering complete protection and a stylish new look.

Customize and protect your Nintendo Switch with a stylish Golden Bubbles MightySkin. Express your unique style with hundreds of other available designs, ensuring your console stands out. MightySkins offer superior protection against scratches, dings, dust, fingertips, and everyday wear and tear, all while maintaining a sleek, matte finish. These ultra-thin, ultra-durable, and stain-resistant vinyl decal stickers are easy to apply and remove without leaving any sticky residue. Made in the USA with a commitment to satisfaction, these decals will keep your gear looking new and you looking sharp. Please note that the Nintendo Switch console is not included.

Embark on a historical journey with 7 Wonders II, a captivating match-3 puzzle game for Nintendo DS. Travel back in time to ancient lands and help construct magnificent structures like Stonehenge and the Taj Mahal. As you play, you'll learn about these wonders and watch them materialize piece by piece. The game features a newly enhanced interactive environment, dazzling power-ups, and bonuses. Collect pieces of a hidden map to uncover a secret route leading to a wondrous sight. Whether you're a returning player or new to the series, 7 Wonders II offers a fresh look and feel for the DS with seven new wonders to explore and build.

Experience a sci-fi mystery epic from Vanillaware, the acclaimed storytellers behind Odin Sphere and Dragon's Crown. Explore thirteen intertwining narratives within a stunning 2D sidescrolling adventure, brought to life by gorgeous art and environments. When monstrous Kaiju attack, engage in fast-paced, top-down combat to defend humanity. Customize your Sentinel with an arsenal of powerful mechsuit weaponry to face the threat. This set includes the DVD ROM.

Experience dual gaming power with the Devastator II, a budget-friendly bundle that enhances the best features of its predecessor. The keyboard boasts a mechanical feel, with Cooler Master's exclusive Mem-chanical switches delivering crisp, tactile key presses. The accompanying mouse offers premium features typically found in high-end gaming mice, including side buttons, vibrant LED lighting, and on-the-fly DPI adjustment. The Devastator II provides excellent performance and exceptional value, making it ideal for both new and experienced PC gamers.

Experience the pinnacle of immersive military gaming with the A50 Battlefield 4 edition. This headset, paired with the ASTRO MixAmp, delivers unparalleled audio immersion, allowing you to pinpoint enemy locations with every gunshot and footstep. Gain a tactical advantage by anticipating your opponents' movements before they hear you.

WARNING: This product contains a chemical known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm.

In a dangerous galaxy where Jedi teachings are lost, a new generation of Force-wielding warriors rises against darkness. Knights of Fate is a 96-page, full-color sourcebook for the Star Wars Force and Destiny Roleplaying Game, focusing on the Warrior career.

This book offers new character options, including three species and three specialization trees that enhance combat through unique Force abilities. Expand your campaign with new starships, vehicles, droids, weapons, and equipment, compatible with the entire Star Wars Roleplaying Game line.

Knights of Fate also provides narrative support and guidance for Warriors, detailing how they face challenges and interact with other character careers.

Defend Earth from an alien invasion! Use your cannon to destroy descending Space Invaders before they reach the ground. Score points by eliminating the enemy and prevent the planet's downfall.

This product includes the game, game case, and manual. Please note that the item shows slight wear from use. The jewel case may be a replacement and could include replacement artwork. Bonus downloadable content may have already been redeemed. This game is a great addition to any collection for both playing and displaying.

Step into the role of a detective in Sudoku Ball - Detective, a mystery game set in a small town. Your mission is to find the murderer by solving various Sudoku Ball puzzles. Each puzzle represents a crucial stage of your investigation, including searching for clues, picking locks, analyzing evidence in the lab, and pursuing the suspect.

Experience exhilarating off-road racing fun with this arcade-style game. Blend high speed, dirt, and mud for an adrenaline-pumping indoor racing experience. Enjoy split-screen multiplayer for two players or compete with up to six players via LAN. Featuring professionally designed tracks and two distinct gameplay modes, this game offers extreme driving challenges. Get ready to hit the gas and push your limits!

Personalize and protect your Sony PS4 controller with a unique MightySkins decal. Our skins offer a stylish way to express your individuality while shielding your controller from scratches, dust, fingertips, and everyday wear and tear.

Crafted from durable, stain-resistant vinyl, these ultra-thin decals apply smoothly and remove without leaving sticky residue, ensuring your controller looks new for longer. Featuring a matte finish and available in hundreds of designs, you're sure to find a style that stands out.

MightySkins are proudly made in the U.S.A. and backed by our satisfaction guarantee. Please note: This product is a vinyl decal sticker, not a hard case. The Sony PS4 controller is not included.

Embark on an epic adventure to save Skylands! Kaos has unleashed his ultimate weapon, the Doomstation of Ultimate Doomstruction, and Skylands is on the brink of collapse. You and the elite SuperChargers must pilot an unstoppable fleet of incredible vehicles across land, sea, and sky. Race against time to stop Kaos and rescue Skylands from destruction.

Experience the intensity of Metallica with Guitar Hero: Metallica for PlayStation 3. Play over 45 explosive hits from Metallica's illustrious career and tracks from legendary artists that influenced the band, including Alice In Chains, Foo Fighters, Lynyrd Skynyrd, Queen, and Bob Seger & The Silver Bullet Band.

Featuring a full suite of instruments, you can shred on the guitar, rip on the drum kit, and wail on the mic. Guitar Hero: Metallica introduces an all-new Expert+ drum difficulty with two bass drum pedals for an authentic experience, complete with note-for-note tracking.

The game allows you to follow Metallica's career and play as your own upstart band aiming to open for them. Motion capture brings the band's unique moves and playing styles to life. Unlock bonus features like videos of old performances, backstage photos, and "Metallifacts" – virtual concerts with on-screen facts and trivia about the songs you play. Please note that DLC may not be included.

Extend your Wii gaming experience with the Wireless Ultra Sensor Bar. This officially licensed Nintendo accessory offers an adjustable, extended play range, perfect for any room size and ideal for large TVs. Enjoy greater flexibility and enhanced motion-based gameplay without the hassle of extra cables, as the sensor bar is completely wireless and runs on four "AA" batteries (sold separately). Its sensitive receiver detects your Wii Remote at distances beyond the standard sensor bar's 16-foot range. Setup is simple and requires no software installation. The convenient auto-shutoff mechanism conserves battery life, and its sleek design complements any entertainment setup.

This is the thinnest wireless Bluetooth adapter for Nintendo Switch, Switch Lite, PS4, and PC, allowing you to easily connect your devices to Bluetooth headsets.

**Specifications:**
*   **Model:** Route Air Bluetooth Audio Transmitter
*   **Material:** PC
*   **Color:** Black
*   **Input Ports:** USB Type C / USB A
*   **Transmission Distance:** 10m / 33ft
*   **Frequency Range:** 2.402GHz - 2.480GHz
*   **Bluetooth Version:** 3.0 + EDR
*   **Dimensions:** 48mm x 14mm x 6.5mm
*   **Supported Platforms:** Nintendo Switch, PS4, PC
*   **Supported Protocols:** Qualcomm aptX LL, aptX, SBC, A2DP, AFH, HFP, HSP

*   1x Route Air Bluetooth Audio Adapter
*   1x USB C to USB A Cable

**Note:** For low-latency audio, both the adapter and your headset must support aptX LL or aptX. We recommend using headsets with this technology for gaming. To unpair, turn off your headset, then long-press the pairing button on the adapter to re-enter pairing mode. With the adapter in pairing mode and your headset off, the previous pairing will be cleared.

Experience the thrill of professional racing with GT 64 Championship Edition. This game puts you behind the wheel of powerful, specially re-engineered cars, allowing you to race through realistic street circuits from Tokyo to the USA. Accurately modeled car systems demand precise control, offering an immersive driving experience.

Customize your vehicle for optimal performance: adjust tire hardness, modify gear ratios, and alter front and rear spoilers. Fine-tune suspension settings, from loose for enhanced traction to tight for improved acceleration.

GT 64 features six tracks (each with long and short versions) and three game modes: Time Trial, Championship, and Battle Mode (a one-on-one race). The control system balances realism and arcade accessibility, though mastering its loose handling and tendency towards oversteering presents a unique challenge.

This collectible Spider-Man Cable Guy is an essential accessory for gamers and tech enthusiasts. It securely holds PlayStation and Xbox controllers, as well as all smartphones. Standing 8 inches tall, the figure comes complete with a 2-meter USB cable and adapters, ensuring compatibility and convenience.

Embark on a thrilling adventure as you confront Mad Dog and his formidable henchmen to reclaim stolen gold. Navigate treacherous paths carefully; a wrong turn could lead to an unwinnable shootout. Master your strategy to reach the climactic showdown and assert your dominance over the territory.

The GameSir G3f wireless controller offers high sensitivity and accuracy, powered by a 600mAh battery that provides up to 18 hours of gameplay. Its 8-way D-pad features four separate balls for precise tactile feedback, making it easier to discern eight compass points.

This controller is compatible with Android (4.0+) and Windows (XP+), as well as PS3. It supports Android standard, D-input, and X-input working modes. The 2.4GHz wireless connection has an effective range of up to 23 feet. Vibration feedback is supported in games that offer it.

The G3f is guaranteed to work with games from the "Happy Chick" app, native Android games, and X-input mode games. Please ensure your device has OTG functionality for Android compatibility.

Included in the box are the GameSir G3f controller, a USB cable, a wireless adapter, an instruction manual, and a warranty card.

In "12 Labours of Hercules 3: Girl Power," assist the brave Megara as she embarks on a quest to rescue her beloved Hercules. When Hercules, Greece's legendary hero, falls victim to the twin monsters Scylla and Charybdis, his resourceful wife Megara steps in. As a formidable warrior, she must prove her heroism to the gods of Olympus. Join Megara in this engaging time management adventure to free Hercules and confront Zeus himself.

Relive the adventure with The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition for PlayStation 4. This enhanced version immerses you in the action with an increased depth of field. Experience a brand new gaming journey with exclusive add-on content, new weapons, characters, and expanded gameplay.

The Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare Digital Pro Edition equips you for a new era of combat with comprehensive digital content. Prepare for demolition derby! This game challenges you to bash, smash, and crash your opponents until their vehicles are out of commission. Equip your car with essential features like roll bars, crumple zones, and hardened fenders to survive the intense competition.

Challenge fiendish computer opponents or test your skills against other players online using the PlayStation Combat Cable. With a diverse selection of tracks and race styles, the action remains thrilling and replayable. The goal is simple: be the last car standing.

Express your fandom with these officially licensed Nintendo Switch Lite skins, featuring familiar characters from Nook Inc.'s business ventures. Designed for the ultimate Nintendo fan, these premium 3M vinyl sheets offer a stylish way to customize and protect your Nintendo Switch Lite system. Celebrate your favorite video game and give your console a unique look. Please note that the Nintendo Switch Lite console is sold separately. This set includes two premium vinyl sheets.

Relive the Sinnoh region's classic story in Pokémon Shining Pearl for the Nintendo Switch. This reimagined adventure unfolds in the familiar, nature-rich Sinnoh region, home to the mighty Mount Coronet and ancient myths. Choose your starter Pokémon—Turtwig, Chimchar, or Piplup—and embark on a quest to become the Pokémon League Champion. Encounter the enigmatic Team Galactic and the Legendary Pokémon Palkia on your journey.

Explore the enhanced Grand Underground, where you can unearth valuable treasure and Pokémon Fossils, and personalize your own Secret Base. Engage in Super Contest Shows, where you and your partner Pokémon showcase skills and dance routines. These activities, along with Grand Underground exploration, can be enjoyed with other players locally or online.

Enhance your adventure by having a befriended Pokémon walk with you, observing their unique animations and interactions. Personalize your look and customize your Poké Balls to add your own flair.

*Additional games and systems required, sold separately.
**Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply.

Experience Metro Redux, the ultimate two-game collection featuring definitive versions of Metro 2033 and Metro: Last Light. Immerse yourself in one of gaming's most atmospheric worlds, now fully realized on the Nintendo Switch. Metro Redux includes all single-player DLC for Metro: Last Light, adding over 10 hours of bonus content to the base game.

Explore life in the Moscow Metro with two distinct play styles. Embrace the slow-burn survival horror of the "Survival" play style, or unleash your inner ranger with the intense combat of the "Spartan" play style.

Enhance your SCUF Vantage and Vantage 2 gaming experience with this customization kit. Designed for PS4 controllers in the SCUF Vantage Series, it offers interchangeable thumbsticks, triggers, and D-pad for improved precision, comfort, and personalization.

Assume the role of a Japanese nobleman and conquer the land of the Rising Sun. Employ military might, diplomatic skill, and cunning to expand your influence and assert your dominance.

Step into the boots of Captain America, the ultimate Super-Soldier, during the darkest days of World War II. This third-person action-adventure game lets you wield Captain America's legendary shield against Hydra's forces and their nefarious allies, including the Red Skull and the Iron Cross.

Experience a captivating blend of free-flowing combo-based combat and acrobatic platforming as you infiltrate Hydra's mysterious castle complex. Use your shield not only for devastating melee attacks and deflecting enemy fire but also to solve puzzles and scale walls.

Featuring an original storyline penned by acclaimed writer Christos Gage, Captain America: Super Soldier brings the adventures of the iconic hero to life with superior graphics and a roster of his greatest villains, immersing you in an epic fight for world domination.

From Steamforged Games, in partnership with BANDAI NAMCO and FromSoftware, comes DARK SOULS: The Roleplaying Game. This complete tabletop roleplaying game offers a blend of adventure, horror, and tactical combat.

Experience superior gaming performance with the Redragon K552 Pro KUMARA 87-key RGB LED backlit mechanical keyboard. This keyboard is built for durability with its solid metal and ABS construction, featuring precision-engineered keycaps and a splash-resistant design. Enjoy smooth, quiet gameplay thanks to the linear, dust-proof red mechanical switches, offering fast action with minimal resistance and no tactile bump.

Customize your setup with vibrant RGB LED backlighting, featuring 18 distinct modes, 6 color options, and 6 brightness levels, including a user-programmable mode. The compact, tenkeyless design maximizes desk space while retaining 87 full-sized keys. All keys are 100% conflict-free with anti-ghosting technology, and 12 multimedia functions are accessible via FN keys. The Windows key can be disabled for uninterrupted gaming. Keycaps provide crystal-clear, scratch-resistant lettering. This keyboard is compatible with Windows operating systems.

Step into the boots of Duke Nukem and save the world from an alien invasion in this First-Person Shooter (FPS). Duke faces pig cops, alien shrink rays, and enormous bosses with his arsenal of over-the-top weapons and non-stop action. The game offers unprecedented interactivity, allowing players to engage in activities like shooting hoops, lifting weights, and interacting with numerous characters. Enjoy hours of single-player action and a variety of multiplayer modes.

The Duke Nukem Forever Balls of Steel edition is a must-have collectible for fans. It includes the game in exclusive packaging, a collectible bust of Duke Nukem, a numbered limited edition certificate of authenticity, a 100-page hardcover art book, a postcard series, a radioactive emblem sticker, a collectible comic book, foldable paper craft, poker chips, and a mini-card deck.

An inner mesh pocket secures essential accessories like a charger, cable, slim power bank, and earbuds. The case also includes a micro-fiber tongue to protect your console's screen from scratches, with additional space for game cartridges and micro SD cards.

Its slim, compact design makes it easy to fit into a purse or backpack, while the comfortable hand strap ensures convenient portability. With 10 dedicated slots, you can carry plenty of games and SD cards for entertainment on the go. The heavy-duty, waterproof hard EVA shell provides excellent protection against drops and bumps, while the soft inner lining prevents scratches. This case is perfect for both children and adults traveling or enjoying holidays.

In the aftermath of Akenash Tower's fall, a critical situation forces Styx out of hiding and into Korrangar, the city of Dark Elves. Despite its seemingly impenetrable defenses, a diplomatic summit provides Styx an opportunity to infiltrate unnoticed. His mission: to steal a scepter of immense power, the ultimate heist. Embark on a stealth-filled adventure featuring new enemies, distinct environments, and refined mechanics. Utilize Styx's enhanced abilities, including grappling around corners, climbing ropes, and using his knife for zip-lining to overcome challenges and achieve his objective.

Enhance your gaming experience with this soft silicone protective skin for the XBOX 360 controller. Designed for a non-slip grip, it improves control and comfort during gameplay. The skin perfectly contours to your controller, ensuring all buttons, triggers, and connection ports remain fully accessible. Crafted from premium silicone, it offers a comfortable feel and is easy to apply and remove. You'll wonder how you ever played without this essential accessory.

This brand new, high-quality console protector is designed for the Nintendo 2DS. It offers a tough, durable surface to keep your console clean and free from scratches. The laser-cut design ensures a perfect fit, allowing easy access to all buttons and features without needing to remove the case. You can plug in your charger, cable, or headset conveniently while the protector is on.

FINAL FANTASY XIII-2 continues the epic saga of the world-renowned FINAL FANTASY series, boasting over 100 million units shipped worldwide. Developed by the acclaimed production staff of the original FINAL FANTASY XIII, this true sequel delivers a deeply immersive experience.

Explore vast, intricately designed environments that reward curiosity. Engage in a refined, strategic Active Time Battle system and customize your party by taming and training monsters to fight alongside you. The multi-path narrative, shaped by your choices, ensures significant replayability.

Additionally, the included Final Fantasy XIII Episode i novella bridges the gap between FINAL FANTASY XIII and FINAL FANTASY XIII-2, presented in a special hardcover edition.

Stop the escapees from Arkham Asylum as Batman and Robin! In this action-packed adventure, build, drive, swing, and fight your way through Gotham City. Then, switch perspectives and play as Batman's iconic villains. Experience the thrilling battle for Gotham from both sides of the law, with no rest for the good or evil.

Become the ultimate train management expert in THE TRAIN GIANT, an engaging urban and traffic simulation. As president of a railway company, you'll build a robust network, prevent city-wide traffic chaos, and watch your city transform from a small town into a bustling metropolis. Success attracts new businesses and residents, fueling growth.

This sophisticated management system features over 30 trains, buses, and trucks across 30 diverse maps and city layouts. You'll manage 120 different building types, including famous landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, Big Ben, and the Empire State Building. Navigate the stock market with 120 companies and experience a dynamic day-and-night cycle. An extensive in-game help system is provided. Compatible with Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7.

Experience superior gaming with this excellent mechanical keyboard, featuring a stylish pink and white design. It boasts 104 keys with responsive blue switches, offering an operating force of 50±15g and a travel distance of 2.0±0.2 mm. Enjoy vibrant white backlighting with adjustable modes, brightness, and speed controlled by intuitive Fn key combinations. This keyboard supports N-key rollover for seamless gameplay and connects via a durable 1.8-meter cord. It operates on 5V and is compatible with Windows Vista and later versions, as well as Linux. Multimedia and shortcut functions are easily accessible through Fn key combinations, including music controls, volume adjustments, email access, web navigation, and a calculator. The net weight is 1300g±15g.

Embark on an interactive adventure with Ms. Frizzle and The Magic School Bus as you explore the vibrant Costa Rican rainforest. This educational game for ages 6-10 invites children to journey through seven ecological zones, collecting samples for a science project. Engage with the rainforest through captivating videos, interactive games, multimedia reports, and fun facts.

As you discover rainforest inhabitants and elements, you can "clone" them with a special device to bring back to the classroom, which magically transforms into a rainforest once four specimens are collected. Explore the Understory, Treefall Gap, and Canopy with investigative tools like a microphone to listen to animal sounds and a telescope for distant observation. While some embedded arcade-style games offer less educational value, activities like "Habitat Build" encourage experimentation with temperature and rainfall to create diverse environments. Testers found the program rich in graphics and engaging for exploration, offering interesting stories and multimedia reports. A journal feature automatically logs snapshots of your discoveries, allowing for personal notes.

Replacement SL SR ZR ZL L button ribbon flex cable for Nintendo Switch Joy-Con controllers. This kit includes the necessary flex cables for repairing or replacing the SL, SR, ZR, ZL, and L buttons on your Joy-Con controllers.

Embark on a captivating JRPG adventure in Cris Tales, a visually stunning indie game that redefines time manipulation. As Crisbell, a newly awakened Time Mage, journey through a world threatened by the tyrannical Time Empress. Peer into the past, influence the present, and witness your choices dynamically reshape the future, all displayed on a single screen.

Recruit allies and master their abilities alongside Crisbell's unique Time Magic to defeat powerful enemies. Send foes to their past selves or to futures where they've succumbed to present-day afflictions. With over 20 hours of gameplay, Cris Tales offers a unique combat system, branching narratives, and a beautifully hand-drawn 2D world animated to bring its consequences to life. Every character, enemy, and kingdom has a past, present, and multiple futures shaped by your actions. Experience an unforgettable exploration of how our choices echo through time.

The game supports up to four players, including a two-on-two co-op option, and offers multiple skill levels, a training mode, various in-game instructors, and different venues. Get ready to dance yourself into shape with this energetic program based on international dance steps and Latin music.

Experience the ultimate online combat with Joint Operations: Combined Arms, the largest multiplayer FPS collection ever. This collection merges Joint Operations: Typhoon Rising and Joint Operations: Escalation, plunging you into the fierce conflict between the Joint Ops Forces and Indonesian Rebels. Engage in massive battles with up to 150 players online via NovaWorld, or host 64-player games online or over a LAN. Test your skills across stunning multiplayer maps, including an abandoned strip mine, waterfall ruins, and a chemical weapons factory.

Equip yourself with over 40 weapons, from long-range stingers and javelin missiles to the M4 machine gun with an M203 grenade launcher. Command a fleet of 35 war machines, including Black Hawks, Little Birds, LCAC hovercraft, and the M-1 Battle Tank, to dominate the battlefield.

The Legend of Heroes III: Shiroki Majo: Mouhitotsu no Eiyuutachi no Monogatari is a Japanese import game in NTSC-J format. This listing includes the game box and packaging.

Embark on a fun-filled adventure with Varmintz! Bounce, dodge, and jump your Varmintz to freedom in this exciting game that blends Pac-Man and Frogger-style gameplay. Guide your five fuzzy friends – Binki, Shady, Rubin, Bean, and Lulu – safely to their dens. Varmintz is incredibly easy to pick up and play, with intuitive controls using your mouse or arrow keys.

*Please note: This game is not compatible with Windows 7 and later operating systems.

Experience DCL - The Game, the official video game of the Drone Champions League. This innovative team sport merges digital and sporting worlds, offering a high-speed, competitive experience for all ages. Fly on spectacular drone racing tracks and witness a unique drone show that blurs the lines between virtual and reality. Master your drone piloting skills in-game and potentially qualify for the DCL draft selection, competing in real-life racing series. Learn to fly before transferring your talents to the real world.

This memory card is designed for the Wii console. To ensure its longevity and performance, please avoid exposing it to extreme temperatures (hot or humid environments, direct sunlight) or physical damage (throwing, dropping, or strong shocks). Do not place heavy objects on the card, and clean it only with appropriate, non-organic cleaning solutions.

Experience unique and changing environments with this game for all ages (ESRB E: Everyone). Enjoy fun minigames and perform crazy tricks. The package includes two racing wheel attachments for enhanced gameplay.

Experience Valkyria Chronicles 4, set during the same conflict as the original but following the new Squad E of the Federation. Commander Claude Wallace and his friends fight for freedom against Imperial soldiers, treacherous blizzards, and the formidable Valkyria.

This coming-of-age story features a fresh cast, including Claude, engineer Riley Miller, Raz, and sniper Kai Schulen, who must navigate the brutal realities of war and the strength of their friendships.

The acclaimed BLiTZ Battle System returns, blending turn-based strategy with real-time third-person shooting. New additions include the Grenadier class, enhanced battleship support, "Last Stand" actions, and larger maps for more strategic combat.

The signature hand-drawn CANVAS Graphics Engine is revitalized, offering a vibrant, watercolor-inspired world that blends reality and imagination. Renowned composer Hitoshi Sakimoto returns to provide the score.

This is a cartridge-only product. Please note that the cartridge and/or label may exhibit cosmetic wear, such as discoloration, tearing, or writing. It is guaranteed to be functional, or a replacement will be provided.

Experience the ultimate basketball arcade action with NBA JAM Tournament Edition. Featuring over 100 NBA superstars, secret characters, Hot Spots, and Power-Ups, this game delivers non-stop, rim-rattling slam dunk excitement. Relive all the original jams and discover new, explosive dunks. Get ready for electrifying gameplay!

Experience 21st-century warfare with Battlefield 2 Complete Collection, immersing you in the heart of a global conflict. Fight as one of three superpowers – the US, Chinese, or Middle East Coalition – utilizing cutting-edge military technology in intense, close-quarters combat across dangerous hot spots.

This collection includes Battlefield 2, the Special Forces expansion pack, and two boosters. Battlefield 2 expands the conflict with new Asian locations and a new Euro Force, featuring three new maps: Operation Smoke Screen, The Great Wall of China, and Taraba Quarry. Engage in combat with four new vehicles and eight new weapons, earning the EU Special Service Medal.

The Armored Fury booster pack introduces the first attempted invasion of America, bringing all-out war to American soil. Explore three new maps: Operation Harvest, Midnight Sun, and Operation Road Rage, and command six new vehicles. Earn the American Theater Special Service Ribbon for your efforts.

Embark on a thrilling quest for riches in The Treasures of Montezuma 3! This captivating match-three puzzle game offers two engaging modes: Casual, for relaxed play, and Timed, for an exhilarating, fast-paced challenge.

Master 160 arcade levels and 42 puzzle levels, discovering unique strategies to upgrade power-ups. Uncover five treasure rooms filled with 40 treasure chests and earn 22 trophies as you progress. Experience spectacular visual effects and explosive audio.

Embark on the ultimate adventure in Etrian Odyssey Nexus, the final installment of the Etrian Odyssey series for Nintendo 3DS. Princess Persephone has summoned the realm's elite explorers to the floating city of Maginia. Your mission: unravel the mysteries of the Lemuria archipelago and its Great Yggdrasil Tree.

Assemble your party from 19 classes, featuring all previous Etrian series classes plus the new "Hero" class. Explore Lemuria in pursuit of treasure and glory! This definitive Etrian experience boasts returning talent, including Character Designer Yuji Himukai, Monster Designer Shin Nagasawa, and Composer Yuzo Koshiro.

Discover familiar characters and locations from past games, tackle over 100 story-driven quests, and choose from variable difficulty settings. Enhance your journey with optional auto-mapping and other accessibility features. Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the series, Etrian Odyssey Nexus offers the ultimate Etrian adventure. Prepare your party, gather supplies, and hone your mapping skills.

Purchase 2000 Destiny Silver and receive 300 bonus Destiny Silver. This in-game currency can be used in Destiny to purchase items for your character from the Eververse Store. Visit Tess Everis in the Tower to browse her available inventory. A PlayStation account is required for game activation and installation on PlayStation 4.

Calculus WIZ is an interactive and easy-to-understand calculus tutorial designed to simplify complex concepts. It covers three semesters of calculus, mirroring the chapter topics and homework problems found in widely used textbooks. Utilizing algorithms powered by Mathematica technology, Calculus WIZ streamlines basic calculations, allowing students to complete homework more efficiently. This reduces the time spent on computations, enabling a greater focus on mastering calculus concepts. Calculus WIZ is compatible with both Macintosh and Windows operating systems.

Experience classic arcade gaming with Atari Collection 2, featuring six beloved titles: Paperboy, Millipede, Crystal Castles, Marble Madness, Roadblasters, and Gauntlet. While the graphics are true to their retro origins, the addictive gameplay remains as compelling as ever. In Paperboy, deliver newspapers through challenging urban environments. Millipede offers fast-paced insect-shooting action. Crystal Castles challenges you to clear a screen of dots while avoiding obstacles, similar to Marble Madness, where you navigate treacherous obstacle courses. Roadblasters provides a straightforward arcade driving and shooting experience, and Gauntlet immerses you in an '80s fantasy dungeon-crawling adventure. This collection offers faithful reproductions and easy-to-learn gameplay, perfect for both retro enthusiasts and new players.

This BASSTOP case is specially designed for DIY customization of your Nintendo Switch Joy-Con controllers. It adds fashion elements to the original design while preserving all original functions. We are dedicated to developing new products and providing the best service to our customers.

The DREVO BladeMaster TE TKL Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is ideal for entry-level and casual gamers. It features a Programmable Genius Knob for easy configuration and a Radi RGB lighting system with 16.8 million color options.

This award-winning keyboard, recognized by the 2018 International Design Excellence and 2019 iF DESIGN AWARD, also boasts 100% anti-ghosting with N-key rollover technology. Save your personalized settings on the onboard storage.

It's compatible with Windows, macOS, Linux, and Unix. Choose from five Cherry MX switch options: Blue, Brown, Red, Speed Silver, and Silent Red. The keycaps are ABS with laser-marked legends for excellent light transmission.

The keyboard includes a detachable USB cable (1.8m), measures 369x136x45mm, and weighs 940g. It supports firmware updates via the DREVO official website and comes with DREVO POWER CONSOLE cloud software for customization.

Included accessories: 1x Keyboard, 1x Keycap Puller, 1x Brusher, 1x User Manual, 1x Warranty Card, 1x Sticker.

Experience the ultimate in realistic pinball gaming with Pro Pinball for the PlayStation. This game meticulously recreates the arcade experience, featuring lifelike flippers, ramps, loops, drop targets, grab magnets, sink holes, and jet bumpers. Unlike scrolling pinball games, Pro Pinball displays all the action at once, which is especially useful when playing with up to six balls simultaneously.

Pro Pinball offers an immersive experience for both novices and seasoned pinball wizards. The game boasts impressive rendered graphics and top-notch dot-matrix backglass animations. The sound design is equally authentic, with realistic flipper, bumper, and launcher sounds, including the signature replay "thwack."

The single table, "The Web," presents a modern pinball machine feel with numerous loops, combos, and a ball magnet. While it excels in replicating the visual and auditory aspects of pinball, the game's controls do not fully capture the tactile sensation of nudging a real machine. Players will find many scoring opportunities and missions to complete on "The Web." The game also provides six distinct camera views for gameplay. While the music can be repetitive, it can be adjusted or turned down.

This infrared sensor bar is designed for the Nintendo Wii console, allowing you to seamlessly receive infrared signals. It's easy to use: simply connect the sensor bar's plug to your Wii console. The included holder provides convenient support, allowing you to attach the sensor bar to the top of your TV. Just tear off the adhesive backing on the holder, fix it to your TV, and then place the sensor bar inside.

**Important:** Ensure the sensor bar is correctly connected to your Wii console. Remove the sensor bar before cleaning.

Compatible With: Nintendo Wii
Color: Silver

Enjoy custom button mapping and up to twice the wireless range compared to previous Xbox One controllers, offering a more stable connection. The integrated 3.5mm stereo headset jack allows you to plug in any compatible headset for immersive audio.

With Bluetooth technology, you can effortlessly play your favorite games on Windows 10 PCs and tablets. This controller is compatible with Xbox One X, Xbox One S, Xbox One, and Windows 10.

The SteelSeries Apex [RAW] gaming keyboard is engineered for speed and precision. Its sleek, low-profile design features low-action keys for quick reflexes. Raised macro keys above the F-keys, combined with 17 independent macro keys offering up to 34 programmable commands across two layers, allow for devastatingly fast key combinations. Easily switch between macro layers using dedicated quick-access buttons.

The Apex [RAW] boasts brilliant white illumination with 8 intensity levels, aiding visibility in low light and macro location. A unique W-key with tactile bumps enhances WASD speed, ensuring a faster return to your primary gaming keys. Integrated SteelSeries media keys provide convenient control over volume and playback. This keyboard combines essential features with optimized functionality for every game.

Embark on a unique fantasy adventure with Hans. This immersive tale is full of surprises and challenges, where every decision counts. Solve puzzles, uncover clues, and find the treasure by unraveling the sordid secrets of the castle. Meet colorful characters, but remember: horror always lurks beneath the surface.

Discover London City, a captivating hidden object game from PlayHOG. Explore four distinct levels, each featuring 40 meticulously hidden objects, for a total of 160 items to find. Arma II: Combined Operations includes the award-winning Arma II: Armed Assault and its standalone expansion, Arma II: Operation Arrowhead. Experience the ultimate military simulation by playing each game separately or by integrating the new features, weapons, units, and vehicles from Operation Arrowhead into Arma II.

Experience the ultimate tactical war-gaming with The Campaign Series: Matrix Edition, a comprehensive collection of TalonSoft's award-winning platoon-level combat series. This edition includes West Front, East Front, and Rising Sun, along with all official add-ons and expansions, allowing you to command the events of World War II from start to finish.

Create your own battles with complete unit, map, and scenario editors, now supporting five major climate zones. Discover new playable nations across all series, including expansion countries for Rising Sun, East Front, and West Front. Engage in diverse scenarios beyond traditional Allied vs. Axis, such as early Soviet/Western Allies confrontations.

Hundreds of new unit types enhance gameplay, featuring units like Cossacks, operational trains, Chinese junks, river gunboats, and various tanks and prototypes. Choose to fight single battles or a series of linked campaign battles against the AI. Enjoy customizable visuals with either 3D maps and icons or a traditional 2D board game style.
Experience immersive 7.1 surround sound on PC, delivering a multi-channel audio experience that places you at the center of your game.

Experience seamless gaming with this wireless controller, designed to function identically to the official PS4 controller. Its ergonomic grips ensure hours of comfortable gameplay.

This controller features a built-in 600mAh lithium battery and charges efficiently via any standard micro USB charger (cable included).

To pair:
1. Fully charge the controller.
2. Connect the controller to your console using the USB cable while the controller is off. The red charging light will illuminate.
3. Press and hold the "HOME" button to initiate pairing.

For subsequent use, simply press the "HOME" button, and the controller will automatically connect to your console.

Package includes:
* 1 x Wireless Controller compatible with PS4
* 1 x Micro USB charge cable

Dead Island Riptide is an open-world action RPG where players battle a zombie outbreak on a tropical island. As a sequel to the original Dead Island, it enhances survival-horror gameplay with a first-person perspective.

Key features include new and returning characters, diverse vehicles, dynamic weather, and challenging new levels. Players can team up in online co-op to employ group defense tactics and improve their proficiency with both melee and projectile weapons.

The Special Edition includes an alternate character skin, weapon modification packs, and a digital strategy map. Continue the fight against the undead in this intense, co-operative survival experience.

Experience the ultimate mashup strategy game in Project X Zone 2, the sequel to the acclaimed world-crossing adventure. Form your dream team by selecting from a vast roster of characters hailing from both classic and current franchises. Engage your enemies in strategic turn-based battles and discover new character combinations to conquer your foes.

Experience peak performance and comfort with this optical gaming mouse, designed for the discerning user. Enjoy enhanced control with multi-button functionality and an adjustable DPI button that allows instantaneous adjustments up to 16,000. The precision button is ideal for in-game sniping, enabling instant sensitivity changes.

Customize your experience with F.L.U.X. desktop software, offering unlimited profile creation and on-mouse storage for your top four profiles. The fully customizable, independent side scroll wheel further enhances control. Personalize the mouse's weight with the adjustable system and create your perfect grip using the adjustable palm rest, or swap it for enhanced comfort and control. Built with durable switches rated for 50 million clicks, this mouse is engineered for longevity and intense gameplay.

Protect your Nintendo Switch with the Niclogi Protective Case. This case is designed to fit perfectly in the dock without removal, offering 360° protection against drops, scratches, dust, and fingerprints. The smooth PC material ensures a comfortable grip for extended gaming sessions. Accurately placed cut-outs provide full access to all Switch features, and the case is compatible with carrying bags.

Please note: The Joy-Con controllers will not fit into the double grip controller when this case is installed, limiting TV mode play with the grip. Additionally, very thick screen protectors may prevent the console from docking; contact Niclogi for support if this occurs. Niclogi guarantees customer satisfaction with replacements or refunds.

Enhance your Ultimate Team experience with FIFA Points. Purchase packs to build your dream squad or enter FUT Draft, the most popular mode in FIFA. A PlayStation Network account is required for download and installation.

This gaming mouse features a quick thumb function for easy navigation through web pages and folders. Customize your lighting experience with 13 modes, including 7-color cycle breathing, 6 single-color breathing options, and 6 single-color constant lights. Long press the light switch for over 2 seconds to turn off the illumination.

Easily adjust DPI with 6 levels: 1000 (red flash), 1600 (orange), 2400 (green), 3200 (light blue), 5500 (blue), and 9200 (purple). The fire key offers convenient double-click functionality with a short press and triple-click with a long press (over 2 seconds), indicated by 3 light flashes.

Specifications include a size of 130x81x40mm, 8x2.5g tuning weights, and a durable braided-fiber USB cable (1.8m). It boasts 8 buttons with a switch life of 800 million clicks, a polling rate of 500Hz, and 23G acceleration. This red wave optical mouse is compatible with Windows and Mac OS.

Before use, please remove the protective film from the foot pads. To restore factory settings, press the left and right buttons simultaneously for over 2 seconds.

This kit requires technical internal fitting; you will need to open your controller using Torx T8 and T6 screwdrivers to install the new parts.

Enhance your gameplay with a set of 6 thumbsticks and 2 D-pads (faceted and standard) for improved accuracy and speed. In Crash Time 2, join the autobahn police force to solve exciting criminal cases or explore an open world while pursuing racers. Experience arcade gameplay with fully destructible cars, outstanding graphics, and stunning slow-motion effects.

The game features five extensive cases, each with up to 10 missions, plus numerous bonus assignments and over 40 new tracks. Solve cases or freely pursue crimes in the game world using your intuition. Encounter approximately 20 AI cars with a visual damage system, leading to spectacular pileups. Enjoy impressive and realistic graphics and landscapes.

Embark on an epic adventure in Eastward, escaping a tyrannical subterranean society to explore a world above. Join the unlikely duo, John and Sam, on a journey across a decaying continent by rail, discovering unique settlements and making new friends. Combine their skills to solve dungeon puzzles, battle unusual enemies, and survive a deadly miasma. Uncover the truth behind Sam's mystic powers and restore harmony to the ravaged lands.

Explore bustling towns, curious campsites, and shady forests. Defend yourself against peculiar monsters and ferocious bosses with an arsenal including a gun, flamethrower, or frying pan. Strategically switch between controlling John and Sam to overcome environmental puzzles and formidable dungeons, separating to unlock paths or sticking together as you navigate a perilous landscape.

Immerse yourself in a heartwarming, story-driven adventure filled with quirky characters and wacky humor. Prepare delicious Eastwardian cuisine using fresh ingredients.

Replacement bottom LCD screen for the Nintendo 3DS XL system. This part is designed for easy installation and is compatible only with the Nintendo 3DS XL (LL) model. Please note: this screen is not compatible with the New Nintendo 3DS XL (2015).

Embark on a brand-new adventure in the epic Chinese Legend of Journey to the West. Based on the record-breaking 2015 CG animated film, *Monkey King: Hero Is Back*, this game follows the legendary Sage, Sun Wukong, after his 500-year imprisonment. He teams up with Liuer, a young boy who idolizes him, on a journey that forges a strong bond between them. Featuring new episodes not seen in the original film, this action-adventure game blends grand Chinese mythology with vibrant and humorous kung fu combat for a delightful, pulse-pounding experience.

Return to Shanghai with Rios and Salem in Army of Two: The 40th Day, a third-person cooperative shooter. As a mysterious catastrophe plunges the city into ruin, you and your partner must fight through ravaged districts to uncover the secret of the Fortieth Day.

This sequel builds upon its predecessor with an expanded playbook of cooperative moves, allowing for dynamic new strategies. Players can also take advantage of advanced weapon customization and upgrade systems. Compete or cooperate in four explosive online multiplayer modes, each emphasizing unique team-based gameplay. Alice Murray returns as your mission coordinator, guiding you through the escalating crisis.

XBAND was an online console gaming network developed by Catapult Entertainment for the SNES and Sega Genesis systems. Debuting in the United States in late 1994 and 1995, XBAND is considered a precursor to modern online gaming services like PlayStation Network, Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection, and Xbox Live.

Embark on an epic adventure in Guild Wars 2: End of Dragons, joining the fight for Tyria’s future. Explore the stunning Canthan continent, a land rich with culture and new challenges. Personalize your journey by traveling and fishing with friends in your very own skiff. Discover nine new elite specializations, each offering unique combat styles and abilities to master. Experience the next chapter in the saga and forge your legend in a world on the brink of change.

This officially licensed Nintendo travel case, developed by Power A, offers a slim, elegant profile for your Nintendo DSi or DSi XL. Its full-zip enclosure ensures your system stays safe. The large interior mesh pocket provides ample storage for accessories, including up to eight Nintendo DS Game Cards. Available in Burgundy, Black, and Blue. High-quality Darksiders steelbook. This durable and stylish case is perfect for housing your Darksiders game or for adding a Darksiders-themed flair to any other game collection.

Experience the ultimate Naruto ninja battle with NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Storm Generations. This latest installment from CyberConnect2 features an expansive roster of playable characters from every era of the Naruto saga, including fan favorites like Raikage, Sasuke Uchiha (Susano'o), Zabuza, and Haku.

Revolutionize online play with robust global functionality, allowing you to compete in a variety of exciting battle modes. The game boasts more playable and support characters than any previous Naruto title, all presented with authentic Japanese voiceovers and a faithful representation of the beloved Naruto universe. Get ready for a torrential downpour of ninja fighting action and adventure in this highly anticipated continuation of the smash-hit series.

Your love story unfolds across parallel worlds. During a vacation from Sakaimachi Academy, Takuya Arima receives a package from his deceased father containing the Reflector Device, a tool for interdimensional travel. Aided by friends, teachers, and romantic interests, Takuya must unravel his father's legacy to avert a reality-threatening calamity.

Explore multiple timelines and revisit events using the Reflector Device's unique Auto Divergence Map System, allowing you to gain new knowledge and items from past occurrences. This 40+ hour visual novel encourages you to fall in love with every character to uncover the true ending and discover the hidden world beyond Sakaimachi. Unearth the secrets of Sword Cape by collecting items across timelines to unlock its hidden truth and solve the mysteries of Sakaimachi.

This RepairBox Replacement Battery Cover is designed to replace the broken or lost battery cover for your Wii Fit Balance Board. Please note that AA batteries are not included with this replacement part.

Experience the latest installment in the TouchMaster puzzle game franchise, celebrated for over 1.5 million copies sold on Nintendo DS. Challenge friends by posting high scores to Facebook and Twitter, and earn achievement badges in this ultimate pick-up-and-play title designed for all ages.

3D Space Action: You're racing against the clock! Time is crucial; run out and it's game over. Enemy fire depletes your time, but defeating bosses rewards you with precious seconds. Choose from three distinct ships: GLUON, PHOTON, and GRAVITON. Equip your vessel with advanced weaponry, including Missiles, the Laser Blade, and Space Mines.

Octopuzzle, from the creators of Puyo Puyo, is an exciting new puzzle game for the Wii. Test your lightning reflexes and quick thinking as you race to clear your screen of Octopi before your opponent. Match colored Octopi in the correct quantities under numbered nets to remove them from the playing field and send annoying Sea Urchins to your opponent's screen. Don't let your screen fill up!

Featuring colorful Octopi, lovable characters, and addictive gameplay, Octopuzzle offers a fun challenge for all ages. With Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection support, players can enjoy competitive gameplay from anywhere.

In the story mode, help apprentice magician Kari rid the land of Lonronpia of thousands of Octopi that fell from the sky after a spell went awry. The game boasts cheerful graphics, unique humor, and simple yet addictive gameplay. Choose from twelve playable characters, each with their own personality, storyline, stage, and special move. Enjoy multiple game modes, including Story, Arcade, and Endless mode, where the goal is to survive as long as possible.

Gradius III was released for the Super Famicom in December 1990 and the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES) in 1991. This port offers reduced difficulty and additional armaments for the Vic Viper. It faithfully replicates the slowdown of its arcade counterpart and omits the pseudo-3D and Crystal levels. A new boss, Beacon, awaits players at the end of an exclusive high-speed stage, which is a counterpart to Gradius II's high-speed stage.

Unique to the SNES version, players can continue after losing all lives. An unlockable "arcade" difficulty can be accessed via a code, though it simply increases the SNES game's difficulty rather than being an exact arcade port. Following the second level, most stages and some bosses from Gradius II are introduced. This port was also made available on the Virtual Console on April 23, 2007.

Experience Hydro Thunder, the first boat racing game for the Dreamcast, which fully utilizes the console's 128-bit processing power. For easy installation:
1. Ensure your hands and device surface are clean and dry. Use isopropyl alcohol to remove dust and oil for optimal adhesive bonding.
2. Gently warm the skin with a hairdryer to make it more pliable before application. Avoid overheating.

Ensure compatibility by verifying your device model. This product is designed for the Nintendo New 3DS and New 3DS XL. Key differences from the original 3DS and 3DS XL include:

*   **Identification:** The word "NEW" is printed on the back, above the Nintendo logo.
*   **Bottom Screen Buttons:** The New 3DS and New 3DS XL feature only one "Home" button below the bottom screen. The "Start" and "Select" buttons are located to the right of the bottom screen. *   **Additional Controls:** The New 3DS and New 3DS XL offer extra buttons: a C-Stick, ZL, and ZR.
*   **Volume Control:** The volume adjuster is located on the left side of the top screen panel.

Experience precise gaming control from up to 30 feet away with the Cordless Precision Controller. Its reliable RF technology ensures seamless gameplay, while the dedicated PS button allows easy access to your PlayStation 3 menu system. Switch between the advanced directional pad and the analog stick with the D/Mode setting, and enjoy responsive gameplay thanks to the reliable analog triggers.

Join the Phantom Thieves and strike back against the corruption overtaking cities across Japan. Your summer vacation with close friends takes a sudden turn as a distorted reality emerges. Reveal the truth and redeem the hearts of those imprisoned at the center of the crisis. This set contains a DVD ROM.

As an elite Armorine, you are Earth's last hope against an impending alien bug invasion. With a futuristic battle suit and a powerful arsenal, you have 120 hours to eliminate the threat. Experience state-of-the-art graphics and intense multiplayer action as you face hordes of ravenous alien insects. The story unfolds as an alien race, seeking survival, discovers Earth and establishes vast underground colonies. By the time Earth's military detects the invasion, it's nearly too late, and they deploy an experimental battle suit. You are the chosen pilot.

Armorines utilizes enhanced Turok 2 technology to deliver a 3D shooter with a cinematic atmosphere. Engage in split-screen Cooperative Quest Mode with a friend or battle it out in four-player multiplayer. Face intelligent enemies with unique behaviors and abilities across diverse environments, from Earth to outer space.

This is a new, full replacement housing shell cover for the Sony PSP 1000 in Crystal Clear White. It includes all necessary buttons, screws, and tools for a complete installation. The set comes with two screwdrivers, all buttons, the surround trim, L and R shoulder buttons, and the analog stick cap. Please note this housing is *only* compatible with the PSP 1000 model and is not suitable for PSP-2000, PSP-2001, PSP-3000, or PSP-3001 consoles. This product is backed by a 2-month warranty.

Protect your Xbox One, One S, or One X controller with this high-quality, medical-grade soft silicone skin. Precisely cut for easy access to all buttons and ports, it shields your controller from shocks and scratches. The package includes six pink Pro thumb grip caps, offering both normal and extra-height options to enhance your grip and comfort during all types of gaming, including FPS and action titles.

Logitech G and GIANTS Software have collaborated to develop this immersive gear, designed to enhance the excitement of virtual farming. As the latest addition to their specialized equipment lineup, the Farm Sim bundle offers realistic tools for a deeply immersive and enjoyable farming experience. Move beyond standard keyboard controls or wheels designed for other genres; this equipment provides a finer degree of control when driving vehicles and operating attachments, ensuring you get the job done right.

Dominate your games and look good doing it with the Officially Licensed PDP Gaming Wired Controller for Xbox. This controller offers advanced customization through the free PDP Control Hub App, allowing you to remap buttons, reconfigure triggers, and adjust dead zones to perfectly match your playstyle. Stay in control of your audio with dedicated controls on the D-pad to adjust game and chat volume seamlessly. Communicate with your team using the built-in 3.5mm audio jack and easily mute your microphone with a quick double-tap of the function button. Enjoy freedom of movement with the 10-foot detachable cable, and share your in-game moments instantly using the dedicated share button. This controller is compatible with Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Windows 10.

Experience the thrill of being a rock star with Guitar Hero! This game offers explosively addictive gameplay as you perform at increasingly larger concert venues, starting in small clubs and progressing to massive stadiums and arenas. Featuring over 30 iconic rock anthems, you'll play songs made famous by legendary artists including the Red Hot Chili Peppers, David Bowie, Boston, Sum 41, Ozzy Osbourne, Audioslave, White Zombie, Franz Ferdinand, and The Ramones. Jam your way to stardom without ever leaving your home!

Embark on the ultimate Yo-kai Watch adventure! In this time-traveling quest, you'll encounter strange, friendly Yo-kai causing mischief. Explore the seaside town of San Fantastico and the sleepy village of Harrisville to find these elusive beings. Travel 60 years into the past with Hovernyan to ensure the Yo-kai Watch Model Zero is created and your timeline is preserved.

This installment features exclusive quests, new areas, and Wicked Yo-kai to befriend. Engage in a revamped Blasters action co-op mode with new bosses, or test your skills in Psychic Blasters, a thrilling 4-player mode where you can control a Yo-kai. Battle online or via local wireless to earn rewards. If you own YO-KAI WATCH 2: Bony Spirits or YO-KAI WATCH 2: Fleshy Souls, you can transfer your save data to YO-KAI WATCH 2: Psychic Specters. Prepare for the most immersive Yo-kai experience yet!

In the grim world of Warhammer, powerful armies clash in cataclysmic battles. Orc hordes assault the Empire, humanity's mighty bastion, while the twisted servants of Chaos gnaw at society from within. A terrifying pattern of strife and warfare emerges, foretelling a time of unprecedented death and destruction.

As the leader of the infamous Grudgebringers, you are drawn into this insidious plot. Your mercenary army must halt the unstoppable tide of evil threatening the Empire before all is lost. Rivers of blood will flow, but every sword plays a part in the titanic struggle to destroy the servants of the Horned Rat.

Experience The Sims 3, offering endless creative possibilities and unexpected moments of surprise and mischief. Create millions of unique Sims, customizing their appearances and personalities. Build their homes, from dream houses to quaint cottages, with extreme home customization tools. Explore seamless, living neighborhoods where your Sims can meet friends, go on dates, visit neighbors, and interact with diverse characters. The new Create a Sim functionality provides easy-to-use design tools for unlimited customization of facial features, hair color, eye color, and more. With rewarding gameplay and quick challenges, choose whether to fulfill your Sims' destinies and make their wishes come true.

Sim Mania for Kids, based on the popular reality game The Sims, offers lifelike, open-ended scenarios in fun and educational settings for ages eight and up. This suite includes six engaging Sims games:

*   **Sim Town:** Build your dream city in this original city simulator.
*   **Sim Park:** Create and manage your own vibrant park filled with plants and animals.
*   **Sim Safari:** Design your own African safari park and camp, featuring exotic flora and fauna.
*   **Sim Tunes:** Compose music by guiding dancing bugs across colored paths to create light bursts.
*   **Widget Workshop:** Explore science and math through hands-on invention and discovery in a laboratory setting.
*   **Sim Ant:** Experience an electronic ant colony based on real ant biology and behavior, where you can "be the ant."

American Fugitive is a single-player, 3D top-down open-world action game set in the criminal underbelly of Redrock County. Players assume the role of Will Riley, wrongly imprisoned for his father's murder. Driven by grief and a thirst for vengeance, Riley escapes jail and must evade recapture by blending in with the townsfolk and infiltrating the criminal underworld. Set in the 1980s deep South, the game is a homage to classic cinema and video games, where justice isn't always legal.

Embark on a charming springtime journey with this delightful match-3 game. Help the Easter Bunny banish winter's chill and light up the magic rainbow with adorable animal friends, including fluffy chicks, frolicking lambs, and bouncy rabbits.

Enjoy smooth, engaging match-3 gameplay enhanced by cute Spring-themed graphics. Choose between relaxed or timed game modes to suit your preference. Unleash powerful Rainbow-powered bonus items for exciting gameplay.

For PC users, you can even set the game's beautiful backgrounds as desktop wallpaper.

Video Card: DirectX 7 compatible with 64MB VRAM

In 1960, the Nazis have won World War II, conquering the globe with advanced technology and an iron fist. Play as B.J. Blazkowicz, a decorated war hero, in an impossible counter-offensive against the formidable Nazi regime.

Collect ultra-advanced Nazi technology by infiltrating secret research facilities and weapon stashes to upgrade your arsenal. This high-octane adventure weaves intense action and a tightly paced, immersive narrative, making you the only one capable of rewriting history.

Experience authentic racing simulation with the DOYO Racing Wheel R270, offering exceptional quality and customization at an aggressive price. Experience the epic sequel to Mount & Blade: Warband, set 200 years before its predecessor. In Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord, a civil war rages across the empire while new kingdoms emerge. Arm yourself, rally your followers, and ride into the chaotic battles of Calradia to forge your own legend. Establish your dominion and rebuild the world from its ruins.

Bannerlord enhances the detailed combat system and expands the world of Calradia. Engage in sieges with powerful engines, build clandestine criminal empires within city walls, or lead charges into the heart of battle. Your quest for power awaits.

This custom PS4 Dualshock controller features a stunning chrome gold shell for a premium look. Embark on an epic journey across four distinct games, exploring exotic locations, undertaking legendary quests, and building new empires. In **Settlement: Colossus**, play as a 300-year-old emperor cursed to find his true love by appeasing the gods. Discover resources, produce tools, erect buildings, and care for your citizens to grow your empire and earn divine favor.

In **Heroes of Hellas 2: Olympia**, rebuild a city from the ashes of a fallen civilization. Combine city-building with match-3 gameplay, utilizing dazzling visual effects and divine spells to overcome challenges.

**Island Realms** challenges you to help shipwrecked sailors survive on a beautiful island. Explore, build essential structures like mills and quarries, engage in trade, and purchase upgrades to create a thriving island paradise and protect your people from threats.

Finally, in **1001 Nights: The Adventures of Sinbad**, help Princess Chalida break a curse trapping her in a wooden body. Solve clever riddles, complete challenging mini-games, find hidden objects, and overcome guardians on this mystical adventure.

Embark on an epic supernatural shooter experience in Wolfenstein, where you play as BJ Blazkowicz, a decorated OSA agent. Armed with a powerful arsenal of Axis and Allied weapons, some enhanced with occult power, you must fight back against this supernatural Nazi force. Relive the pivotal conflicts of 19th-century North America with The Mexican American War for Windows. Engage in historical or alternate scenarios of the Mexican-American War (1846-1847) and the Texas War of Independence (1835-1836), fighting from the plains of Texas to the decisive Battle of San Jacinto.

This strategy game features multiple weapon types, with a new weapon.dat file for customization and enhanced weapon flags such as firing while mounted, indirect fire, and unique melee bonuses for small arms. Utilize Engineers to build and destroy bridges, impacting troop movement. Improved fortified positions and battalion color displays aid strategic management.

Enjoy flexible gameplay with AI, Hot Seat, PBEM, LAN, and Internet play modes. A scenario editor allows for modifications and new campaign creation.

Protect your Nintendo Switch from scratches with the KMD Tempered Glass Screen Protector. This premium screen guard offers durable protection, allowing you to enjoy your console worry-free for longer.

Revitalize your system with a fresh new look! This durable vinyl skin easily applies to your system, providing a striking new design. Blast Off is an interstellar arcade game where players pilot a rocket ship through bizarre planetary systems to rescue lost astronauts. Navigate challenging gravity fields to carry astronauts through warp gates to safety. Gravity can be a helpful ally, but beware, as it can also lead to a crash.

The game features 45 missions across four difficulty settings. Explore planets and asteroids, whose gravity attracts your ship, allowing for maneuverability. Black holes exert a fierce pull, while white holes create a reverse gravity field, pushing you away. Mission success is ranked by remaining fuel and air, and the number of astronauts collected, earning you Silver, Gold, or Brick medals. Good luck!

Street Fighter revolutionized the fighting game genre. Street Fighter 2 introduced groundbreaking graphics and gameplay, highlighting a competitive, hand-to-hand combat experience. The series' success stems from its emphasis on player skill development and its subversion of the stereotype that size dictates strength.

Street Fighter 3: Double Impact for Dreamcast offers two complete arcade games: Street Fighter 3: New Generation and Street Fighter 3: Second Impact. New Generation includes familiar characters Ken and Ryu alongside a diverse cast of newcomers, each with unique origins and fighting styles. Second Impact expands this roster further.

Key gameplay features include the parrying system for deflecting attacks and the ability to customize characters with one of three Super Art moves before each match.

Compete in Wipeout Create & Crash, bringing the excitement of the popular Wipeout TV show into your living room with the all-new Course Creator. Test your skills and see if you have what it takes to conquer the world-famous Big Balls. Go all in or face the Wipeout!

Unleash your imagination and create your own Skylanders to battle in an ultimate adventure with the almighty Senseis and save Skylands. This Girl Power Sensei Bundle is an Amazon exclusive. Sensei Skylanders are masters of unique fighting styles and secret battle techniques, having dedicated themselves to exploring Skylands and training potential heroes. With Kaos creating villainous Doomlanders, Master Eon has called upon the Senseis to lead a new generation of heroes, the Skylander Imaginators.

This bundle features some of Skylands' most powerful female Sensei heroes and villains. Each Sensei is a master of one of ten Battle Class Types, wielding unique weapons and powers. Harness their strength to make your Imaginator Skylanders even more powerful. Senseis also unlock special gear and abilities, and are the ultimate masters of Sky-Chi Powers. Discover new treasures with Battle Gongs, Sensei Shrines, and Elemental Realms. Bring your Skylanders to life and create your ultimate team with over 30 Skylanders to collect and infinite creation possibilities. Compatible with Skylanders Spyro's Adventure, Skylanders Giants, and Skylanders Swap Force.

Master the art of material imbalances in chess with GM Dejan Bojkov's new DVD. This comprehensive guide explores typical unbalanced positions, such as queen versus two rooks or rook and pawn against two minor pieces. While nominal piece values (queen=9 pawns, rook=5, minor piece=3) provide a basic understanding, real game situations often present more complex exchanges where a seemingly equal material trade can lead to a decisive advantage.

GM Bojkov, a Bulgarian Grandmaster and former national champion, systematizes the most crucial material imbalances. He provides valuable advice on how to navigate and profit from these resulting positions, revealing the hidden factors that influence exchanges. Learn to understand the true value of pieces beyond their nominal worth and make informed decisions to gain an edge.
This is a VITAL BRACELET DIGITAL MONSTER wearable LCD toy that nurtures your Digimon based on your activity status, including exercise.

Enhance your VR experience with the SARLAR comprehensive accessory kit, designed for Oculus Quest and Quest 2. This all-in-one solution ensures quality and satisfaction.

The stylish carrying case features a unique, streamlined sports car exterior with a deluxe, bright, reflective texture that adds a three-dimensional appeal and comfortable grip. It's specifically designed to protect your VR headset.

Embark on a thrilling adventure with Nancy Drew in "Sea of Darkness." Investigate the mysterious disappearance of Captain Magnus aboard the celebrated ship, "Heerlijkheid." Once the centerpiece of an Icelandic festival, the renovated vessel is now an eerie distraction. Was the captain lured away by a legendary treasure, or did he vanish into the night? Take the helm as Nancy Drew and uncover the truth in this exciting mystery.

Experience the scariest Solitaire game of the season with "Solitaire Halloween 2." This game is perfect for lovers of mysticism, puzzles, and relaxing Solitaire.

"Solitaire Halloween 2" features 120 new and unique levels, complete with scary stories, special treats, and a distinctive holiday style. It's an ideal choice for any Solitaire and Halloween enthusiast.

Enhance airflow and prevent overheating with strategically placed vents that promote superior air circulation, keeping your console cool during intense gaming sessions. Embark on your FINAL FANTASY XIV Online journey with the most complete edition. This bundle includes:

*   **FINAL FANTASY XIV: A Realm Reborn:** Forge your unique hero and begin your adventures in Eorzea.
*   **FINAL FANTASY XIV: Heavensward:** Soar to the skies and end the Dragonsong War, restoring light to the realm.
*   **FINAL FANTASY XIV: Stormblood:** Fight for freedom in the East, exploring new lands and mastering the Red Mage and Samurai jobs.
*   **FINAL FANTASY XIV: Shadowbringers:** Embrace the darkness in the latest expansion, with new Gunbreaker and Dancer jobs, and Viera and Hrothgar races.

This edition includes a 30-day free play period, applicable once per platform on a single service account where a license has not already been registered. User registration and a service subscription are required to play.

Experience the next generation of racing with Ride 4! Live the game at its highest potential with dynamic resolution up to 4K and 60 FPS. Face more challenging races with up to 20 bikes online and offline, and feel the thrill of riding with the PS5 DualSense controller's haptic feedback. Owners of Ride 4 on PS4 before April 30, 2021, are entitled to a free upgrade to the PS5 version.

Experience the thrilling origin story of Lara Croft in this first adventure. After a shipwreck leaves her stranded on an unknown island, an ordinary woman must discover her inner strength to survive.

The Collector's Edition includes:
*   A copy of the game.
*   A highly detailed, 8-inch tall Play Arts Kai Lara Croft figurine. This fully posable figure features over 40 points of articulation and realistic weathering on her clothes and body, reflecting her arduous fight for survival. It comes with an alternate set of three hands, a bow and arrow, shotgun, handgun, and climbing axe.
*   The Endurance Survival Kit Packaging, a worn steel tin salvaged from the shipwreck.
*   A 15" x 19" double-sided island map and poster, detailing key landmarks of Yamatai and featuring the game's box art on the reverse.
*   A 5" x 7" heavy stock lithograph print designed by Crystal Dynamics.

Dive into wild arcade action and save your aquarium from alien invaders! Feed your colorful fish and sea creatures, then collect their dropped coins to upgrade food, unlock new fish species, and acquire powerful weapons. Use these weapons to defeat ruthless extraterrestrial boss beasts and prevent your aquarium from being sunk.

Explore a vibrant underwater world with fantastic fish and sea creatures. Choose from four engaging game modes: Adventure, Timed, Challenge, and Virtual Tank. Enjoy enhanced sound effects and an original score as you play. Personalize your experience by stocking your virtual tank with custom-named fish and creating your own aquarium screensaver. Save your high scores for posterity.
