Experience the ultimate real-time strategy game with Warcraft II Battle.net Edition. This comprehensive package includes the original WarCraft II: Tides of Darkness and its expansion, Beyond the Dark Portal, enhanced with free Internet play via Battle.net. Compete against up to eight players worldwide in the epic saga of the clash between humans and orcs for dominance over Azeroth.

Manage resources, build your medieval empire, and engage in tactical warfare across land, sea, and air. Command either the Orcs or humans through engaging scenarios, custom games, or network play. Warcraft II offers an addictive real-time experience with integrated sound design essential for unit feedback. This edition provides a beautifully illustrated guide to game locations and characters, compatible with Windows 98/95/NT 4.0 and Power Macintosh.

Experience an ultra-realistic flight simulation with FlightGear, developed over two decades. This comprehensive package includes worldwide scenery with over 20,000 real airports, allowing you to fly anywhere, anytime, day or night. Explore hundreds of aircraft, from classic planes to modern helicopters and airships.

FlightGear is compatible with Microsoft Windows PC and macOS (10.12 Sierra to latest). Enjoy free lifetime updates, live weather, real aviation charts, multiplayer servers, and realistic scenery with night lighting. The simulator supports various control inputs including keyboard, mouse, joystick, yoke, and pedals, with multiple display support.

This PixelClassics disc includes full worldwide scenery, 530+ aircraft (over 600 total including downloads), and access to a repository of 1000+ aircraft liveries. A user-friendly installation menu and guide are provided for PC users.

Recommended system specifications: Quad-core CPU, 6GB RAM, 2048MB VRAM GPU, and 5GB HDD. Please note: This is the FlightGear flight simulator, not Microsoft Flight Simulator. The disc is pictured and includes a protective sleeve; a retail box is not included.

Embark on a thrilling chase where you are both hunter and hunted. Infiltrate a ruthless international crime syndicate and bring them down from behind the wheel. Pursue a maniacal driver whose escape may depend on his life, as he holds the answers you seek. Outrun pursuing police cruisers, leveraging your experience and skill to evade the law, confront the enemy, and uncover the truth to end the chase.

The PARALEX, the smallest frame in the ESPORT series, brings GUNNAR's i-AMP lens technology to narrower faces. Its low-profile, ergonomically designed temples fit comfortably under headsets, while floating, adjustable nose pads ensure a wide range of fits.

Featuring GUNNAR's proprietary i-AMP lens technology, these glasses enhance the interaction between your eyes and digital devices. The highly wrapped, curved lens shape creates a more humid environment around the eyes, reducing dryness and irritation. The lens geometry provides slight focusing power to alleviate eyestrain from pixilated images, improving visual detail for sharper, clearer vision.

The optically pure, lightweight lens material ensures clarity and comfort. The amber tint filters harsh fluorescent light and high-intensity blue light, enhancing contrast and providing a warmer, natural light spectrum for reduced eye stress and improved productivity.

Lens coatings include an anti-reflective layer to minimize glare and a hard coat for durability and scratch resistance. Constructed with advanced, lightweight, and durable materials, GUNNAR eyewear offers both comfort and style for extended use. The PARALEX improves contrast for greater accuracy and efficiency.

Breath of Fire IV is a single-player RPG continuing the saga of the "dragon people." In this installment, war erupts between two continents, and Princess Elena vanishes during a tour of the conflict zone. Her sister, Nina, ruler of the Windia Kingdom, embarks on a quest to find her. Along her journey, she meets Ryu, who joins her in this epic adventure.

The game features a simplified gameplay system with minor enhancements to the battle mechanics. A new combo system allows spells to inflict greater damage when used in sequence. Ryu can transform into a dragon or a half-human, half-dragon hybrid for enhanced attacks. Players will recruit additional party members, some with transformation abilities. Each town offers new subquests and minigames, such as a fishing game, extending the game's longevity and replayability.

Embark on an epic journey through Mordor in Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor. Uncover the truth behind your spirit's compulsion, discover the origins of the Rings of Power, forge your legend, and ultimately confront the evil of Sauron.

MLB The Show '16 delivers the most immersive and authentic baseball gaming experience on consoles. This installment introduces significant gameplay enhancements, exciting new game modes, and expanded personalization options, allowing you to fully customize your baseball journey.

Embark on a swashbuckling adventure with Caribbean Treasures, a family-friendly "search-and-find" game. Follow a band of pirates across the Caribbean as they pursue riches. Explore historical locations and events, encountering intriguing characters who share captivating tales of their pirate encounters and the era. Discover the thrill of the pirate life in this engaging game.

This comprehensive collection includes the original EverQuest and ten expansion packs. Explore Norrath through the eyes of powerful creatures in "Depths of Darkhollow," utilizing their unique abilities in battle. Journey with the Wayfarers Brotherhood to the war-torn Realm of Discord in "Omens of War" to thwart an impending invasion. In "Gates of Discord," confront the Legion of Mata Muram, Norrath's greatest threat, in an all-out war inspired by a mage's vision. This collection also features "Lost Dungeons of Norrath," "The Scars of Velious," and "Shadows of Luclin," offering extensive adventures and lore.

When strange readings from a dying star reach the Protostar, Dal R’El and Gwyndala must race against time to save their friends, their ship, new alien species, and an entire planetary system before a supernova. The Protostar’s malfunctioning transporter scatters the crew across three alien planets. Dal and Gwyn must use their wits and skills to overcome ingenious puzzles, endure hostile environments, and battle deadly robot armies to rescue Jankom Pog, Rok-Tahk, Zero, and Murf. As they search for their friends, they discover a sinister and deadly new enemy determined to destroy the Protostar and change the course of history.

Fred, a young American student, travels to India to meet his fiancée, Anusha. Upon arrival, Anusha is abducted by members of a Thug sect devoted to the worship of Kali. Driven by a singular purpose, Fred embarks on a desperate mission to rescue his beloved. The adventure unfolds over three mysterious days in India, with each day divided into alternating segments of reality and dreams.

Embark on an epic adventure in Mount & Blade: A Time of War, A Game of Legend. Calradia, a land embroiled in constant conflict, offers immense riches and perilous challenges to those brave enough to fight on its soil. Forge your legend as an unknown stranger, rise to power with unwavering courage and a skilled sword, and depose kings or crown new ones at your will.

Experience unparalleled free-form sandbox gameplay, allowing you to explore hundreds of unique locations and pursue any path you desire. Master visceral horseback combat, wielding swords, lances, or bows from your mount. Engage in battles with an expansive arsenal of medieval weapons, each boasting distinct characteristics and strategic advantages. The highly advanced and intuitive sword-fighting system ensures every duel is engaging.

From a lone adventurer to a commanding general of armies, your role is yours to define. Face challenging AI in both combat and strategic decision-making, and interact with hundreds of characters throughout your journey.

With the CTA Digital Auto-Cooler Console Stand, your Xbox 360 will run flawlessly for years to come.

A grisly murder in modern-day Tokyo forces an unexpected detour, leaving the protagonist buried and unconscious. He awakens in a devastated new Tokyo, a wasteland ravaged by apocalypse and now called Da'at. Before demons can claim him, a savior emerges, and together they become a Nahobino—a being neither human nor demon.

With this newfound power, the protagonist journeys through Da'at, an enigmatic realm where mythical deities and demonic tyrants clash for survival. Seeking answers, he must forge his own path in a battle between light and dark to determine the world's fate.

Key features include an allusive story with tragic choices, where sacrifices and the pursuit of light or darkness shape your role in the new world. Battle through the demon-infested wasteland using the Press Turn Battle System. Exploit enemy weaknesses for consecutive actions, but one mistake can be fatal. Turn formidable foes into allies through negotiations, then fuse them to create customized demons. Explore the expansive, post-apocalyptic Tokyo, rendered in stunning 3D with Unreal Engine 4, a first for the mainline Shin Megami Tensei series.

Experience the first authentic hip-hop dance game featuring a tracklist dedicated to the genre's biggest hits, from Run-DMC to Chris Brown and Nicki Minaj. Master over 700 dance moves, choreographed by celebrity experts like Laurieann Gibson and Dave Scott, across 30 years of hip-hop music.

Challenge yourself with three difficulty levels per song and customize your avatar with hundreds of fashion options. Immerse yourself in the hip-hop universe with lavish visual effects and engaging gameplay. Enjoy endless fun with intelligent shuffle features and high-energy multiplayer modes, including dance battles and parties. This game is the ultimate way to dance to your favorite hits.

The SteelSeries Kana is an ambidextrous optical mouse engineered for all grip styles: palm, claw, and swipe. Developed in collaboration with professional gaming teams, its functionality, ergonomic button layout, and size have been perfected for consistency and accuracy in tournament conditions.

Featuring two XL-sized side buttons, one on each side, the Kana ensures easy rapid-fire actions. Its tournament-grade optical sensor and coated feet provide an ideal balance of size and performance. Enhanced durability is delivered through a double-braided, tangle-free nylon cord.

The SteelSeries Kana is available in two community-selected versions: White 1.1 and Black 1.1, the latter chosen by over 300,000 Facebook gamers. Its advanced optical technology tracks at 3600 FPS and supports movement speeds up to 130 inches per second, ensuring consistent performance even during rapid movements.

Experience the zany characters and unique locations of the Madagascar movies in Madagascar Kartz, an arcade-style kart racer perfect for the whole family. Join Alex, Marty, Gloria, Melman, King Julien, and the penguins, plus unlock bonus characters like Shrek and B.O.B. Race across over 20 wild tracks inspired by movie scenes, including the plane wreck, New York City Zoo, and volcano. Discover unlockable bonus tracks such as Shrek’s Swamp and the Mother Ship. Put the pedal to the metal with wacky karts, power-ups, and non-stop racing action.
SPORE Galactic Adventures is the first expansion pack for the original SPORE game. It requires the original SPORE to play.

Manual Samuel is a unique adventure game where you play as Samuel, a spoiled rich kid who must survive 24 hours by manually controlling his every bodily function after striking a deal with Death. From breathing and blinking to the mundane tasks of daily life, you are in complete control. Death himself accompanies Samuel on this bizarre journey, adding to the challenge and dark humor.

Test your willpower in this latest installment of the Mega Man Battle Network series, where Lan and Mega Man battle viruses to protect the net. The game features an innovative "dark chip" system, offering a powerful advantage in tough situations. However, overusing dark chips risks corrupting your abilities. The MD-81/82, an evolution of the DC-9, is a distinctive aircraft with a T-tail, rear-mounted jet engines, and a long, slender fuselage, commonly seen on short to medium-haul routes worldwide. Commercial Level Simulations brings this iconic aircraft to FSX with 15 authentic liveries.

Part of the F-Lite range, these models offer high detail and realism without the complexity of advanced simulators. They represent a significant upgrade from default Flight Simulator aircraft, providing detailed modeling and cockpit systems that are accessible for quick takeoffs.

Key features include a dedicated FSX release compatible with DX10 Preview, a highly detailed exterior, and an interactive 3D virtual cockpit. Enjoy a 2D panel with custom gauges, the option to view wings from the interior, and functional elements like a switchable pushback truck and aircraft stairs. Enhancements like dynamic wing flex and a detailed external flight deck contribute to realism.

Immerse yourself with a high-fidelity sound set recorded from the actual aircraft and numerous animations. Special effects include engine start smoke, touchdown tyre smoke, and over-rotation sparks. A comprehensive manual with a flight tutorial is included.

**Chicago Enforcer: A Critical Review**

Released in March 2005, Chicago Enforcer is a first-person shooter that attempts to transport players to the mob-controlled 1920s. However, the game suffers from significant flaws. Reviewer Jeremy Zoss highlights poor level design, nonexistent enemy artificial intelligence, and subpar graphics, all compounded by numerous technical issues. The experience is described as reminiscent of early 1990s PC mods, lacking engaging gameplay. While the game includes Xbox Live support, online player activity is reportedly minimal. Chicago Enforcer received a rating of 2 out of 10.

Shovel Knight: Treasure Trove is the definitive edition of Shovel Knight, a classic action-adventure game series celebrated for its engaging gameplay, memorable characters, and retro 8-bit aesthetic. Confront the formidable Knights of the Order of No Quarter and their sinister leader, the Enchantress.

This gaming controller features intuitive power management for seamless operation. To power on, press any key for 2 seconds to connect a new device, or press the HOME key for 2 seconds to connect a paired device.

The controller automatically powers off in various scenarios: when the Home key is held until the LED turns off (connected state), after pairing timeout, after 5 minutes of inactivity in the connected state, or when the battery voltage is critically low. A low-power alarm will blink the LED4 when the battery is low.

While charging, the LED4 will flash slowly and remain solid when fully charged. The controller will hibernate after 5 minutes of inactivity, and can be woken by pressing the HOME key for 2 seconds, automatically re-connecting to the last device.

Specifications:
Color: Black/Green
Transmission Distance: Up to 8 meters
Working Voltage: DC 3.7-4.2V
Working Current: 5-30mA
Quiescent Current: 10-80uA
Charging Voltage/Current: 5.0V / ≤500mA
Battery: DC 3.7V / 400mAh
Usage Time: 10+ hours
Standby Time: Approximately 30 days

Package includes: 1 x Gaming Controller, 1 x Charging Cable, 1 x Mobile Phone Telescopic Bracket, 1 x Instruction Manual.

This interactive adventure game puts players in the role of a plumber on a quest to win a woman's affection. In DEATHLOOP, rival assassins Colt and Julianna are trapped in a time loop on the island of Blackreef, forced to relive the same day eternally. As Colt, your objective is to break the cycle by eliminating eight key targets before the day resets. Each loop presents a fresh opportunity to experiment with different strategies, discover new weapons and abilities, and gather crucial intel. Master the art of repeated attempts by adapting your playstyle, whether you prefer stealthy infiltration or aggressive combat.

DEATHLOOP blends single-player narrative with optional, high-stakes multiplayer. Hunt your targets as Colt to escape Blackreef, or assume the role of Julianna, a rival assassin who can be controlled by another player or AI. This player-versus-player element allows you to invade other players' campaigns or defend your own.

Explore Blackreef, a stunning retro-future island inspired by the 1960s, designed with Arkane's signature artistic flair and emergent gameplay. This visually striking paradise serves as Colt's prison, a decadent world where death is meaningless and revelers party eternally, holding him captive.

Embark on an intergalactic quest with "The ClueFinders Reading Adventures: Mystery of the Missing Amulet," a computer game for ages 9-12. This engaging adventure not only entertains but also sharpens essential language arts skills through a variety of interactive challenges.

Players will enhance their vocabulary, categorization, and reasoning abilities with ThermaGems and LavaRocks. Improve spelling and understanding of prefixes and suffixes with Jukebox Jumbler. Crystal Gateway and Mystic Gateway focus on sequencing and reading comprehension, while Bridge Builder strengthens grammar and sentence structure. Experience the definitive PC motorcycle racing simulation with SBK Superbike World Championship. Race against real riders on authentic tracks and bikes. This game goes beyond casual arcade racers, offering a substantial dose of simulation-style realism.

Record of Agarest War is a strategic turn-based RPG for Xbox 360 that blends dating simulation with traditional combat. Your decisions and actions shape an evolving story across multiple generations. The game features AI party combat, character-specific and combined attacks, and HUD monitoring systems to track your progress and the romantic feelings of female characters.

Key features include the unique Soul Breed system, allowing you to choose a bride at the end of an adventure to birth the hero of the next generation. Utilize the Affection Gauge to easily track the ladies' opinions of you. This enhanced version is based on the Japanese release of Record of Agarest War: Reappearance and includes exclusive trophy and achievement support for the North American version.

Experience the ultimate simulation of the world's most popular airliner with the PMDG 737NGX 800/900 for Microsoft Flight Simulator X. Developed over three years with technical input from Boeing and real-life 737NG crew, this add-on offers unparalleled systems fidelity. Every aircraft system has been meticulously modeled for a dynamic and realistic flight experience.

Witness live hydraulic fluid movement and pressure changes as you operate wing spoilers. Observe real-time electrical load adjustments when activating exterior lights, bringing the aircraft to life. The PMDG 737NGX features the first optically collimated Head-up Guidance System (HGS) in an MSFS airliner, allowing for realistic head movement and consistent symbology orientation. Additionally, enjoy 3D volumetric exterior lighting that illuminates the scenery and is visible from the cockpit.

Experience the thrill of the Touhou universe in Touhou Kobuto V: Burst Battle, a fast-paced bullet-hell battle game. Take control of your favorite Touhou characters and engage in exciting aerial combat. Each character boasts unique, ear-tingling music that will immerse you in the action.

Experience Flashback, the acclaimed action-adventure game, now available on Nintendo Switch! Originally released in 1993 and celebrated for its pioneering motion capture animation and hand-drawn backgrounds, this science fiction classic has sold over 2.2 million units worldwide. Set in 2142, you play as Conrad B. Hart, a scientist with amnesia stranded on Titan. You must fight for survival against pursuers and uncover an alien conspiracy threatening the planet. This remastered version includes a Modern mode featuring post-FX graphic filters, remastered sound and music, and a new adjustable "Rewind" function. Tutorials are also included to help new players. "Time Gap" sends you on a quest to save humanity after a mysterious event erases it from existence. Finally, "Time Trap 2" continues the story of the Ring of Time corporation, where experiments in the Abandoned City have transformed the anomalous zone into a place called Timeless.

When Nina discovers her father has vanished without a trace, her ordinary life is upended. Facing a reluctant police force, Nina embarks on a personal investigation. She teams up with Max Gruber, her father's young colleague, who impulsively offers his assistance.

Together, they uncover that Nina's father was part of a research expedition to Siberia, seeking to explain the mysterious 1908 Tunguska catastrophe—a colossal explosion and inferno that devastated the Tunguska region. Their search for answers propels Nina and Max across the globe to locations including Berlin, Moscow, Cuba, China, and the Antarctic. They soon realize Nina's father's disappearance is directly linked to the Tunguska event.

As powerful adversaries also pursue Nina's father's secret, the stakes escalate far beyond a simple missing person case.

For optimal performance, ensure your PS2's video output is set to Y Cb/Pb Cr/Pr within the console's settings. Connect the included USB cable to the PS2's USB slot for power.

This device allows you to boot backups of your Xtreme Xbox 360 and Xbox 1 games, with emulator support. It also supports booting original Xbox 360 and Xbox 1 discs (emulator-supported).

To flash your drive, follow these steps at your own risk:
1. Connect the DVD drive's SATA cable to your PC, keeping the drive's power cable connected to the Xbox 360.
2. Ensure the Hitachi drive is in mode B, using either the two-wire trick or a Slax Linux boot CD.
3. Run `Xtreme.bat` from a DOS prompt, specifying the drive letter (e.g., `xtreme.bat g`). The `Xtreme.bat` file automatically backs up your DVD drive firmware to `orig.bin` and renames existing `orig.bin` files nine times.
4. Press any key to continue after each flash.

To revert to your original firmware, run `Restore.bat` with the drive letter (e.g., `restore.bat g`).

Embark on an epic battle through time and space. Millennia ago, warriors of the idyllic world Pureland sealed themselves in their own dimension to escape conquest. Their protection relied on Talon, a powerful spacecraft capable of time and space travel. Centuries later, an ancient enemy has created a galactic rift, unleashing the Pureland Water Entity to consume everything. To save the universe, you must journey through the past, present, and future, collecting the 13 scattered pieces of the devoured Talon. Only by reassembling Talon can you avert total destruction.

Battleship: Surface Thunder offers a surprising variety of entertainment. Tecmo Super Bowl returns for 2018, featuring the release of the game and the 5th annual Preview Magazine. Player ratings are based on Madden statistics. This version incorporates numerous enhancements and contributions from various authors.

Key gameplay adjustments include:
*   Improved AI for offensive and defensive play, with COM looks for open receivers and COM Ultra Logic for better defense.
*   Dynamic animations for tackles and improved tackling mechanics.
*   Enhanced realism with more accurate attribute labels like Acceleration and edited Ball Control ratios.
*   Adjustments to kicking mechanics, including arrow speed, range, and kickoff distance/speed.
*   Tighter blocking for field goals and increased QB fumble rates.
*   Edited animation times for fumbles and handoffs, and edited COM juice.
*   Play action passes are now more balanced regarding catchability and interceptability.
*   Optimized player positioning, including kick returner placement and LB distance from the line of scrimmage.
*   Modified team tendencies, with heavy pass teams passing less and Run and Shoot QBs rarely scrambling.
*   Static schedules ensure consistent weekly matchups.
*   Quickness attribute has been changed to Coverage.
*   Kick returners now utilize their actual attributes.
*   A halftime stats screen provides in-game insights.
*   The playoff bracket has been corrected.
*   MAN-controlled QB rollouts are now functional.

The playbooks have been significantly reorganized for improved usefulness, logic, balance, and modernity, featuring new plays such as Shotgun Shovel, Shotgun Zone Read variations, and Pro Set Quick Pitch plays.

Facing uncooperative locals and suspicious police reports, Pierce soon finds himself entangled in a terrifying conspiracy involving cultists and otherworldly horrors. In this world, where sanity is fragile and darkness whispers, nothing is as it seems. Strange creatures, bizarre science, and shadowy cults driven by their mad schemes threaten to bring about the end of everything. Your mind will be your greatest challenge.

Rising Storm is the next installment in the award-winning Red Orchestra franchise, bringing the intense, realistic gameplay of Red Orchestra 2 to the Pacific Theater of World War II. Fight as either the US Army/Marine Corps or the Imperial Japanese Army/Special Naval Landing Forces across iconic locations from 1942 to 1945, including Guadalcanal, Iwo Jima, and Saipan. Experience diverse combat scenarios such as beach assaults, jungle warfare, and close-quarters night fighting.

This standalone multiplayer game supports up to 64 players per server and features asymmetric warfare. Americans boast superior firepower with automatic weapons, while the Japanese rely on ferocity, courage, and tactical equipment. New additions include six multiplayer maps, over 20 new weapons like the US Garand and M1903 Springfield, and Japanese armaments such as Arisaka rifles and the Type 100 SMG. The flamethrower is also available for American forces. Players can strategically use the Japanese knee mortar and booby-trap grenades, while the bayonet and Banzai charge offer advantages in close combat. All Red Orchestra 2 multiplayer content is included.

Ensure your PlayStation 4 controllers are always ready for action with this dual controller charging stand. Designed specifically for official PS4 controllers, it features two charging ports with a stylish blue LED indicator that glows blue when fully charged and red while charging. A built-in protector chip prevents overcharging, allowing you to leave controllers connected overnight.

Powered by any USB port, this stand efficiently charges two controllers simultaneously, typically within two to four hours. It helps save space and keeps your gaming setup organized.

Includes:
* 1x PS4 Dual Controller Charging Stand
* 1x USB Charge Cable

Experience two of PlayStation's highest-rated franchises with the PlayStation 3 Legacy Bundle. This limited edition package includes a black PlayStation 3 system with a massive 500GB hard drive, perfect for storing games, movies, music, and photos.

The bundle features Gran Turismo 5 XL, the ultimate version of the best-selling racing simulator. It includes the full original game, all Spec 2.0 updates, and a voucher for over $20 in bonus downloadable content, such as new cars and tracks.

Also included is inFAMOUS 2, a gripping open-world action-adventure. Continue Cole's journey as he explores his super-powered potential and confronts a future enemy, making critical choices that will shape the fate of humanity.

The Razer Abyssus Mirror Special Edition gaming mouse is engineered for gamers who require peak form, functionality, and reliability during intense gameplay. It boasts a sleek, glossy finish and features two large buttons optimized for maximum tactile feedback, complemented by Razer’s signature Hyperesponse technology.

For precise control, the Abyssus Mirror includes two accessible mechanical switches. An on-the-fly DPI switch offers a choice of 450, 1800, or 3500 DPI. Additionally, a polling rate switch allows instant adjustment from 125Hz to 1000Hz Ultrapolling. This special edition mouse comes with a Certificate of Authenticity, Quick Start Guide, and Master Guide.

This bundle includes one black Wii Remote Controller and one black Wii MotionPlus accessory. The wireless, motion-sensitive Wii Remote offers an intuitive, natural way to play games, freeing you from cords and complicated buttons without sacrificing depth. It accentuates the sense of touch, allowing you to feel the emotion with each movement. Up to four players can join in, ensuring a party is always ready to happen.

Connect the Wii MotionPlus accessory to your Wii Remote to increase accuracy and enhance control in compatible games. Wii MotionPlus contains additional sensors that make the Wii Remote respond to the slightest movement, motion, or twist of the wrist.

Experience the best of Nintendo's 8-bit classics with this Nintendo Selects title for the 3DS. Mash-up 16 iconic NES games into rapid-fire challenges and remix stages that combine elements from different titles. Test your skills on a gauntlet of quick, tricky challenges, including stages from the *NES Remix* and *NES Remix 2* games. Enjoy portable power and discover great games at a great price.

*Note: Downloadable content, trials, or subscriptions may not be included or guaranteed to work.*

The Mega Man: Robot Master Field Guide is the definitive handbook to the classic Mega Man universe. This ultimate guide features detailed profiles of all major Mega Man characters, including every Robot Master from Mega Man 1-10, Mega Man & Bass, and the Mega Man Gameboy series. You'll also find entries for important special characters like Proto Man, Rush, Roll, and Duo. Each profile showcases classic CAPCOM artwork and includes comprehensive bios, memorable quotes, likes and dislikes, signature weapons, and the secret weaknesses of each Robot Master.

Protect your Nintendo Switch and Switch OLED with this high-quality cotton dust cover. It features a soft interior lining and easy access to the cable port. The cover is precision cut to fit your console horizontally, ensuring a snug and secure fit. It is hand washable and ironable for convenient maintenance. Please note that the console is not included.

Use this PlayStation Store gift card to purchase games, add-ons, subscriptions, and more from the PlayStation Store. Available in denominations from $10 to $100, gift cards provide an easy way to add funds to your PlayStation wallet, either digitally or by redeeming a physical card.

PlayStation Network account and internet connection are required for redemption. Users must be 18 years or older. Pre-load titles to ensure you can play the moment they become available, and take advantage of regular deals and discounts on top games. You can also remotely add purchases to your download queue from anywhere online to start playing sooner. Content purchased is added to your library and can be downloaded, played, deleted, and re-installed as needed.

Embark on adrenaline-fueled 4-player action in the legendary Gauntlet universe. Arm yourself and up to three friends to destroy evil forces across seven kingdoms, exploring three new worlds filled with unique enemies, traps, and treasures. Wield powerful sorcery, exotic power-ups, and new "Items of Legend" to save the Realm from the Demon Lord Skorne.

Choose from four classic characters and unlock five hidden ones to battle hordes of vile enemies and six formidable bosses. Become part of the Gauntlet saga by completing over 20 magical quests, enhanced with new in-engine cinematics that unfold a rich storyline. This reimagining of the classic offers themed levels, treasure-based purchases, and challenging boss encounters, all presented with a signature bird's-eye view perspective.

This charging dock allows you to simultaneously charge up to four Nintendo Switch Joy-Cons or two Switch Pro Controllers. It also offers flexible charging configurations, such as charging two Joy-Cons and one Pro Controller at once, on either side of the dock.

Integrated LED indicators clearly display charging status. For Joy-Cons, a red light signifies active charging, turning green upon a full charge. Pro Controllers are indicated by a green light during charging, which turns off when fully charged.

The charger features a safe and durable design with built-in protection against over-current, over-heat, over-voltage, and short-circuits. Made from ABS material, it uses a Type-C 5V DC input with a charging current of 500mA*4.

Included in the box are one Nintendo Switch Joy-Con Charger and one 0.8m Type-C Cable. Please note that the Switch console, Joy-Cons, and Pro Controllers are not included. For optimal charging, Joy-Cons must be inserted facing opposite directions.

Omitium Store provides a 12-Month Worry-Free Warranty and Lifetime Technical Support for this product. All items are rigorously tested before shipment. Contact us via Amazon email for any assistance.

Step into the chilling mystery of White Haven. You awaken in a derelict building with amnesia, struggling with the effects of an unknown drug. A cryptic young girl offers clues, while a mysterious man, potentially holding the key to your past, torments you with his experiments. Explore unsettling environments and test your intellect to uncover the truth. You must find the antidote and unravel the secrets of White Haven before time runs out.

System Requirements:
*   Operating System: Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista
*   Processor: 1800 MHz
*   RAM: 512 MB
*   Hard Disk Space: 850 MB
*   Video Card: 32 MB

Embark on a challenging gothic RPG adventure in Darkest Dungeon, a game that explores the psychological toll of dungeon crawling. Lead a band of flawed heroes on a perilous side-scrolling descent, facing not only monstrous foes but also famine, disease, and the creeping dread of the encroaching darkness. Delve five hundred feet below the earth to confront unimaginable threats and uncover strange mysteries.

Darkest Dungeon emphasizes the emotional vulnerability of its heroes, questioning the cost of a life dedicated to adventure. Recruit, train, and guide your team through twisted forests, forgotten warrens, and ruined crypts, engaging in strategic turn-based combat against a formidable array of monsters.

The Collector's Edition includes the original Darkest Dungeon game along with all downloadable content: The Shieldbreaker, The Color of Madness, The Crimson Court, and The Musketeer.

Experience the ultimate basketball simulation with NBA Live 06 for the Nintendo GameCube. Take control of your favorite NBA stars as "Freestyle Superstars," each with unique player types like Power, Playmaker, and Stopper, performing with unparalleled realism. The authentic five-on-five gameplay features an all-new animation system, showcasing the NBA's fast-paced, up-tempo style. Enjoy an improved transition game and more physical play, with realistic collisions and dramatic dunking scenarios. Enhanced new player visuals boast striking detail and realism, making player models look and act like their real-life counterparts. The broadcast experience is elevated with Marv Albert and new color commentator Steve Kerr, joined by Ernie Johnson and Kenny Smith for dynamic play-by-play commentary.
The World of Nintendo 2.5-inch figure line features classic and new characters. Unlike previous PVC figures, these are poseable, allowing for dynamic display options.

Return as the CEO of an international airline in this legendary, tongue-in-cheek economic simulation. Airline Tycoon 2 challenges you to build a modern airline, design unique aircraft, and transform a struggling carrier into a globally recognized company. Explore real-world airports, from Moscow to Caracas, with realistic travel conditions and passenger volumes.

Utilize the in-game editor to create your ideal fleet, from cost-effective mass-transportation planes to luxurious private jets. Manage your home airport in full 3D, direct employees, and expand your airline. Test your business acumen by scheduling flights, coordinating arrivals and departures, and balancing finances to boost profits and global reputation. Beware of rivals actively working to dominate the skies. Random events, such as the Pope's visit, add variety to the gameplay.

Experience vivid and immersive virtual reality with the Lenovo Explorer. This headset, designed for modern PCs, transports you to exciting virtual worlds. Explore top travel destinations, become the hero of thrilling games, attend popular events, or travel through time and space – all from the comfort of your home. The Lenovo Explorer is quick to set up, comfortable, and lightweight, ensuring hours of entertainment as you discover the magic of Windows Mixed Reality.

Embark on a heroic RPG adventure in this new installment of the Bravely Default series. Join Seth, a young sailor, and the other Heroes of Light—Gloria, Elvis, and Adelle—as they strive to save the continent of Excillant from a looming darkness. Explore a world brought to life with striking visuals and detailed scenery.

Master the strategic, turn-based combat by utilizing the Brave and Default system. Choose to act multiple times in a turn with Brave, risking your next turn, or play defensively with Default to accumulate Brave Points for powerful future actions. Success hinges on balancing risk and reward.

Customize your party by selecting from a vast array of jobs, skills, and abilities. Defeat powerful Asterisk bosses to unlock new jobs, enhancing your tactical options. The fate of Excillant rests in your hands as you guide the Heroes of Light to victory.

Embark on a remarkable adventure as Sherlock Holmes and investigate the mysterious case of a missing archaeologist and a valuable Egyptian mummy in turn-of-the-century England. What begins as a simple case quickly becomes a web of intrigue, robbery, priceless artifacts, and murder. Your investigative skills will be tested as you explore a large Victorian mansion, solving numerous puzzles and riddles to uncover the truth. Uncertain leads, an illusive saboteur, the disappearance of an ancient mummy, and a strange murder all thicken the plot.

Inspired by the writings of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, this game features an involving storyline in true Sherlock Holmes style, set within a wonderfully appointed, atmospheric, and graphically detailed mansion. You'll search for, collect, and use numerous interesting objects throughout gameplay.

The Skylanders Mini Adventure Case offers safe storage for your prized mini figures and accessories. It also doubles as a convenient staging area for gameplay, allowing you to seamlessly transition from storage to adventure.

The Afterglow Karga is an exclusive wireless headset for Xbox One. It features a hybrid design combining the latest Afterglow aesthetics with a split cushion headband for superior comfort and reduced pressure. Enjoy immersive audio with 50mm driver speakers, complemented by rounded ear cushions with extra padding. The retractable, noise-canceling microphone boom ensures clear communication.

This headset is compatible with Xbox One and includes an auxiliary cable for seamless mobile device connectivity.

This 2-pack of black silicone protective covers is designed for the Sony PS5 Dualsense controller. Each cover includes two black thumb grips, ensuring a secure and comfortable gaming experience. The durable silicone material protects your controller from scratches, dust, and everyday wear and tear.
Communicate with teammates during online gameplay using this Nyko Xbox Live Wireless Headset. Enjoy the freedom to talk, strategize, and taunt from anywhere in the room, unhindered by wires.

Winner of over 200 Game of the Year Awards, Skyrim Special Edition immerses you in a vast open world with stunningly detailed graphics. This edition includes the critically acclaimed base game and its add-ons, enhanced with remastered art and effects. Experience a more lifelike world with volumetric god rays, dynamic depth of field, and screen-space reflections.

Skyrim Special Edition also brings the power of PC mods to consoles, offering nearly endless possibilities. Explore new quests, discover uncharted environments, interact with new characters, and engage in fresh dialogue. Equip yourself with new armor and weapons to enhance your gameplay. The inclusion of mods ensures a unique and expansive experience every time you play.

Expand your Xbox Series X, S, One X, S, or Original (1st Gen) game console storage instantly with the Avolusion PRO-Z 12TB External Gaming Hard Drive in white. This plug-and-play USB 3.0 drive offers a portable and reliable solution for storing and backing up your game data, music, pictures, and videos. Its fan-less design ensures quiet operation.

Built with high-quality materials and advanced interface technology, the PRO-Z drive is designed for years of dependable performance. It features a 12TB capacity, USB 3.0 interface with data speeds up to 5.0 Gbps, and comes pre-formatted for immediate use.

Package contents include the 12TB Avolusion PRO-Z External Gaming Storage, USB 3.0 cable, power adapter, user manual, and a 2-year warranty.

The reported capacity of storage drives may appear lower than the advertised size due to differences in measurement standards between the drive manufacturer and the operating system. For example, a 512GB drive may display approximately 420GB, and a 1TB drive may show around 867GB. This is a common discrepancy based on how storage capacity is calculated.

Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Conviction is the fifth installment in the stealth-action combat series. The game follows black ops agent Sam Fisher as he investigates his daughter's death, uncovering a betrayal by his former agency, Third Echelon. Now a renegade, Fisher must thwart a deadly terrorist plot that threatens millions.

Splinter Cell: Conviction builds upon the franchise's legacy with an engaging story, classic stealth action, and new gameplay mechanics for both single-player and multiplayer modes. It also features unique co-op gameplay and jaw-dropping visuals, making it a standout addition to the Splinter Cell catalog.

Experience pro-level precision with the Xbox Elite Wireless Controller. This controller offers extensive customization with an arsenal of swappable components, including various thumbsticks, D-pads, and paddles, allowing for a tailored feel and game-changing accuracy.

Enhance your gameplay with Hair Trigger Locks for rapid-fire actions, and fine-tune motor control through the easy-to-use app. The controller features haptic feedback, including Impulse Triggers and rumble motors, for immersive gameplay.

Included are 2 AA batteries. The controller is compatible with the Xbox One Play & Charge Kit (sold separately).

For assistance, please visit http://support.xbox.com/en-US/ or call (800) 4MY-XBOX.

The snakebyte Charge: Tower Pro is the ultimate PlayStation 4 accessory. This all-in-one solution allows you to store and display up to 15 games or movies while simultaneously charging your controllers. The base features a 2-port USB hub, and the detachable top station can charge two DualShock 4 controllers concurrently. Integrated LED indicators clearly show charging status, letting you know when your controllers are ready. Designed specifically for the PlayStation 4, assembly is incredibly simple.

This handheld game console features 666 built-in classic retro games, perfect for children aged 4-12 and enjoyable for the whole family. Its cute and popular design will delight kids.

The console boasts a 3.5-inch eye-protection screen that provides soft, non-harmful light. Its convenient, lightweight design makes it ideal for travel and on-the-go entertainment.

Experience epic battles as Aragorn, Legolas, and Gimli in The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers action-adventure game. Take direct control of the trilogy's heroes while other Fellowship members support you in gameplay. Battle diverse Orcs and formidable boss monsters like the Cave Troll and Saruman. A tactical gameplay system rewards quick reflexes and strategic choices in character selection, weaponry, and combat maneuvers.

Embark on a wacky adventure with the Prince of All Cosmos in Katamari Damacy REROLL, now on Nintendo Switch! The King of All Cosmos has accidentally destroyed the stars, and it's up to his pint-sized son to restore them. Enjoy this beloved roll-em-up game with fully updated graphics, recreated cutscenes, and full HD visuals, playable at home or on the go.

Experience enhanced gameplay with Joy-Con controls. Utilize gyro controls for precise Katamari steering, and perform a Prince Dash by shaking the Joy-Cons in table-top mode. Challenge a friend in multiplayer mode using two Joy-Cons. A Nintendo Switch Online membership may be required for online play. Terms apply. Cable Guys are fun, functional figures designed to hold and charge your game controllers and phones. Simply place your device in the figure's arms, connect the included power cable, and begin charging in style. This unique charging solution adds a touch of personality to your gaming setup.

Rims Racing is the first motorbike simulation that combines a realistic racing challenge with engineering and mechanics. Ride the world's most powerful superbikes, optimizing their performance by swapping parts, analyzing real-time data, and tracking component wear. Success is achieved not only on the track but also in the workshop. Understand motorbike behavior like a real engineer by considering factors such as traction, angle, braking, torque, trajectory, and speed. Then, head to the workshop to change and optimize components, configuring the ideal setup for victory.

Embark on an action-packed adventure in BEN 10 ALIEN FORCE: Vilgax Attacks, the latest installment in the hit video game franchise. For the first time, players will guide Ben and the Omnitrix into outer space and across alien home planets to thwart Vilgax's universe-conquering scheme.

Utilize ten of Ben's iconic alien forms—Echo Echo, Goop, Brainstorm, Chromastone, Big Chill, Humungousaur, Spidermonkey, Swampfire, Jet Ray, and Cannonbolt—each with unique powers. Battle Vilgax and his formidable team in an original storyline developed exclusively for the game. Journey to never-before-seen planets in an upgradeable spacecraft, navigating asteroid fields and engaging enemy ships.

BEN 10 ALIEN FORCE: Vilgax Attacks blends combat, puzzle-solving, and platforming for hours of engaging gameplay suitable for all skill levels.

Embark on a thrilling adventure aboard the Titanic II to avert a catastrophe on its maiden voyage. A hidden bomb threatens the luxury liner, and you are the only passenger who can find it and save everyone. This Adventure-Puzzle game challenges your skills as you explore the ship, uncover clues, and solve a century-old mystery connected to the original Titanic. Discover little-known secrets of the historic vessel while navigating 30 intricate levels, each featuring challenging mini-games. With classic Hidden Object gameplay and easy-to-use Wii Remote controls, Titanic Mystery offers suspense, exploration, and fun for the whole family.

Enhance your Nintendo Switch racing experience with this 2-pack of TalkWorks Steering Wheel Controllers. Designed to transform your Joy-Con controllers into immersive racing wheels, these accessories are perfect for Mario Kart and other racing titles. Enjoy head-to-head driving competition that will entertain the whole family for hours. The ergonomic design ensures a comfortable fit for users of all ages, with ample space for all button functions. These wheels are compatible with both left and right Joy-Con controllers, making them ideal for games like Mario Kart 8 Deluxe. Explore additional TalkWorks accessories for Nintendo Switch to complete your setup.

The SteelSeries Ikari Laser Limited Edition Sudden Attack is designed for the popular online FPS game. It features a unique black, white, and gray camouflage print. Its advanced high-precision sensor captures 40,000 samples per second (SPS), ideal for FPS gamers. The SteelSeries XY2 laser engine supports resolution settings with one Count Per Inch (CPI) increments, allowing gamers to fine-tune the mouse to their personal reaction time. A built-in LED display at the bottom of the mouse enables players to adjust settings anytime, anywhere, without requiring software or drivers.

Discover Nintendo Labo, an innovative collection of interactive experiences that blend making, playing, and discovery. Designed to spark creativity in all ages, Labo combines the Nintendo Switch console with simple cardboard sheets to construct unique "Toy-Con" creations.

Assemble cardboard into diverse Toy-Con, such as an RC Car, Fishing Rod, House, Motorbike, or Piano. Then, combine these creations with your Nintendo Switch to bring them to life through engaging games and playful interactions. Nintendo Labo offers a fun, hands-on way to explore how technology can transform ideas into reality. It's a completely new way to play.

The T.Flight HOTAS 4 is an official joystick for PlayStation 4, also compatible with PC, designed for realistic gameplay. It features a large hand rest and an accessible rapid-fire trigger on the stick. The life-size, detachable throttle offers responsive power control. Navigate with the dual rudder system, which can be operated by rotating the handle with its integrated locking system, or by using a progressive tilting lever. This programmable joystick has mappable buttons and internal memory to save your latest settings, even when disconnected. The set includes the joystick, throttle, an Allen key, and a user manual with warranty information.

This amiibo figure features Zelda in her iconic, toon-shaded style from The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker. Dressed in the ornamentation of the royal family, this collectible is a must-have for fans of the series. Compatible with Nintendo Switch, 3DS, and Wii U.

This official i-Guide DVD Strategy Guide is the ultimate resource for Dragon Ball Z Budokai 3. Secure your PS4 Slim with this durable vertical stand. Its locking mechanism and two rubber-padded pegs ensure stability, preventing your console from tipping over. The all-new Razer DeathAdder features the world's first 6400dpi optical sensor. This upgrade delivers high performance while maintaining the familiar feel of the optical sensor trusted by DeathAdder users.

Keep your Nintendo handheld powered for uninterrupted gaming, browsing, audio, and photo viewing with Mad Catz' Power Solution. Compact and lightweight, this power solution is your essential companion for maintaining precious battery life, whether you're at home or traveling.

The PlayStation Vita features breakthrough controls, including multi-touch front and back screens and dual analog sticks, designed to blur the lines between entertainment and reality. Embark on a fun-filled, humorous journey through the new Star Wars adventure with the return of the No. 1 LEGO videogame franchise. LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens immerses fans in the exciting new saga like never before. Please note that Downloadable Content (DLC) may not be included and is not guaranteed to work.

This is a new KEM-410CCA full optical block, an original replacement lens for the Sony PlayStation 3 (PS3) console. It is designed to resolve issues such as disc read errors, failure to read specific games, slow disc loading times, scene skipping, or perceived disc damage or dirt on the screen.

Please ensure this part is compatible with your specific PS3 model and matches the component you are replacing. This product does not include an instruction manual, guide, or video. It is recommended for experienced technicians.

Protect your PS4 analog sticks and enhance your gaming experience with these high-quality, durable rubber thumb grips. Designed for popular FPS titles like Halo and Call of Duty, they quickly mount over existing analog sticks, whether new or worn. The convex right stick provides enhanced precision and accuracy for aiming, while the concave left stick offers superior grip and comfort, reducing hand and thumb fatigue during long gaming sessions.

The Providence-class Dreadnought, epitomized by the infamous Invisible Hand, serves as the flagship of General Grievous and the Separatist navy. These formidable warships are characterized by heavy armament, robust shielding capable of withstanding enemy attacks, and the ability to carry numerous fighters and battle droids. This Expansion Pack allows you to add a detailed, pre-painted miniature of a Providence-class Dreadnought to your fleet. It includes two ship cards, enabling you to field it as either a standard Providence-class Dreadnought or a Carrier variant, making it a daunting presence on the battlefield.

Embark on a mature RPG-Adventure in the deranged 1920s universe of New Arcadia, a unique blend of comic-book, pulp horror, and H.P. Lovecraft. Created by Penny Arcade's Mike Krahulik and Jerry Holkins, legendary designer Ron Gilbert, and Hothead Games, this episodic game delivers an authentic Penny Arcade experience with bizarre characters, outrageous combat, and adult humor.

Episode One introduces Gabe and Tycho of the Startling Developments Detective Agency as they solve mysteries and combat enemies in New Arcadia, brought to life with distinct artwork by Krahulik.

Episode Two sees Gabe and Tycho return to explore the Cloying Odor Sanitarium. Wield new weapons, battle giant spiders, and pursue a menacing, fruit-fornicating robot. Return to New Arcadia for more puzzles, new areas, adjustable difficulty settings, and expanded leveling.

Become the ultimate killing machine in Gungrave G.O.R.E, a stylish third-person action shooter that blends Eastern and Western game design. Play as Grave, a brutal anti-hero who charges headfirst into hordes of enemies, offering no quarter. Master Gun Kata, a seamless fusion of stylish shooting and close-range martial arts, to unleash devastating combos. Utilize your unlimited ammo Cerberus pistols and transformable EVO-coffin to maximize damage and style.

Experience an epic and emotional story of vengeance, love, and loyalty, with over 12 hours of gameplay in story mode, perfect for both Gungrave fans and newcomers. Embark on a visually stunning adventure across South-East Asia, featuring reimagined real-life locations with a dark, futuristic aesthetic.

Experience immersive gaming with the Afterglow LVL 5 headset. Its rugged camo design and noise-cancelling technology ensure clear, well-balanced audio by blocking distractions. Designed for extended play, the lightweight build offers superior comfort.

The flexible, pivoting boom microphone allows for precise positioning. Simply plug the wired headset into your controller for high-quality audio. Enjoy Afterglow's signature lighting and a dynamic haptic driver for adjustable bass levels, enhancing how you feel your games. Easily manage volume and mic mute directly from the ear cup, enabling seamless communication with teammates and other players.

The Rabbids are ready to conquer history in their first platform-adventure game, exclusively for the Nintendo 3DS. After stumbling upon a history museum, these mischievous creatures discover time travel through their "Time Washing Machine," setting them on a path to wreak havoc on human history.

Join the Rabbids in this hilarious 2D and 3D side-scrolling adventure as they journey through iconic historical locations like ancient Rome and Egypt, as well as lush jungles and deserts. Customize your Rabbid with a variety of wacky costumes, including cowboy and Roman outfits. The pick-up-and-play controls make it easy for the whole family to enjoy jumping over obstacles, kicking enemies, and breaking blocks.

Engage in exciting gameplay across three distinct modes: Story, Time-Attack, and Challenge, ensuring endless fun and replayability as you help the Rabbids "conquer history."

Shape your legend in EA SPORTS UFC 4. Your fighter is defined by your playstyle, accomplishments, and personality, placing you at the center of every fight. The game features online interactions and in-game purchases.

This high-quality plastic battery cover is designed to fit PSP 2000 and PSP 3000 models. It offers a perfect, universal fit for your PSP Slim, helping to restore its appearance and make it look brand new. One battery cover is included.

War, the first Horseman of the Apocalypse, was deceived by evil forces into prematurely ending the world, thereby inciting a war between Heaven and Hell. This conflict resulted in the demonic forces defeating Heaven and claiming Earth.

Indicted by the sacred Charred Council and stripped of his powers, War is given a chance to return to Earth. His mission: to uncover the truth and punish those responsible for his disgrace. Hunted by vengeful Angels, War must battle the forces of Hell, form uneasy alliances with demons, and traverse the ravaged Earth in his quest for vengeance and vindication.

Extend your Dragon Ball Xenoverse experience with the Season Pass, offering a cost-effective way to access all downloadable content. This pass grants access to all Dragon Ball Xenoverse DLC packs sold separately, providing enhanced customization options and an extended journey to mend Dragon Ball's history.

The Season Pass includes:
*   New playable characters
*   Additional episodes and quests
*   New masters and master quests
*   New stages
*   Exclusive skills, costumes, and accessories
*   Unique Z-souls

Content can be downloaded in-game or via the PlayStation Store as it becomes available.

Enhance your gaming experience with this 7-color LED light analog thumbstick mod for PS4 controllers. This high-quality accessory, measuring approximately 360mm in length and 17mm in diameter, features seven vibrant colors: green, purple, purple-blue, red, yellow, dark blue, and light blue. Its power-saving design automatically turns off after 2-3 minutes of inactivity and can be easily reactivated with a shake. The mod offers a simple connection, serving as a convenient backup solution to avoid repair hassles.

**Installation Instructions:**
Connect the red wire to the positive terminal and the yellow wire to the negative terminal of the power board. Ensure correct wiring to prevent damage.

**Package Includes:**
1 x 7 Colors LED Light Analog Thumb Sticks Mod

Arcana Heart 3: LOVE MAX!!!!! is the definitive edition of this 2D fighter, featuring rebalanced gameplay and exciting new game modes. Choose from 23 charming anime characters, each with unique attacks, defensive skills, and presented in new 3D rendered environments. Discover powerful character and Arcana combinations to develop your own deadly custom combos. Test your mettle in online multiplayer or immerse yourself in the expanded story mode. Explore new hidden scenarios and over 300 vignettes that offer a glimpse into the heroines' daily lives, ensuring countless hours of engaging content.

Experience Lemony Snicket's "A Series of Unfortunate Events" as the Baudelaire orphans. This treacherous tale allows you to embody Violet, Klaus, and Sunny, using their unique talents to outwit the evil Count Olaf and protect your family fortune. Based on the popular children's novel series, this game follows the orphans as their luck continually worsens. Stay one step ahead of your distant uncle and his wicked schemes.

Experience the all-new FieldSENSE Gameplay System in EA SPORTS Madden NFL 23 for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S. This innovative system delivers consistent, ultra-realistic gameplay and grants players enhanced control across all positions and modes. FieldSENSE utilizes advanced animation branching and new user control mechanics for a fluid gameplay experience with authentic results.

In Face of the Franchise: The League, new position-specific mechanics powered by FieldSENSE, combined with player-focused cameras, immerse you in the action. Dominate every snap from anywhere on the field as you forge your legacy. Franchise mode features updated front-office management, simplified team-building, and convenient competition. Assemble your ultimate roster in Madden Ultimate Team.
